vpon ye name ye lord ſhalbe ſaued ⊢ ✚ ye men iſrael heare theſe wordes ieſus nazareth ye mā alowed god amōge wt miracle wōders tokēs ye god hath wrought hym myddeſt ye knowe math • 7 • ſame beynge taken afore defyned counſell foreknowlege god haue ye punyſhynge hym ſlayen handes wycked men actu 10 e god hath rayſed vp ſorowes hell beynge louſed ſo much impoſſible hym holden wyth dauid ſayeth hym pſal 15 b haue alwaye ſet lorde afore ſyght ryght hāde leſt moued therfore harte glad tunge hath reioyced moreouer fleſh alſo ſhall reſt hope thou ſhalt leaue ſoule hell nother ſhalt yu ſuffre thy holyone ſe corrupcion thou haſt made wayes lyfe knowē vnto thou ſhalt make ful ioyfulneſſe wyth thy countenaunce ⊢ ye men brother let boldelye ſpeake vnto dauid patriarke • reg 2 bfor alſo deade buryed hys ſepulchre wyth v vntyll thys daye wherfore ſeynge prophete knewe god wyth othe ſworne vnto hym pſa 131 b frute hys loynes ſyt vpon hys ſeate ſeynge aforehande ſpake reſurreccion chriſt nother lefte hell hys fleſh ſawe corrupcion ſame ieſus hath god rayſed agayne iohā 15 actu 1 whoſe wytneſſes seynge phil 2 exalted ryghthande god ye promyſe holy gooſt beynge receaued father hath poured thys gyfte ye ſe heare dauid gone vp heauen ſayeth hymſelfe pſal 109 lorde ſayde vnto lorde ſytte ryghte hande vntyll ſet thyne enemyes ſtoole thy fete let houſe iſraell therfore knowe ſurely god hath made ſame ieſus ye haue crucifyed lorde chriſt zach 12 • theſe thynges beynge herde pricked harte ſayde vnto peter apoſtles ye men brother luce 3 b actu 9 16 ſhal peter ſayd vnto repente let euery one baptyſed name ieſu chriſt remiſſion ſynnes ye ſhall receaue gyfte holy gooſt vnto ioel 2 • promyſe made vnto chyldren vnto farre whō ſo euer lorde god ſhall call hetherto wyth many wordes dyd wytneſſe exhorte ſayenge ſaued thys wycked generacion dyd receaue hys worde baptyſed daye ther added vnto thre thouſande beleuynge ſoules continuynge doctrine apoſtles communion breakynge bread prayer ther came feare vpon euery ſoule many wonder token done apoſtles ieruſalem greate feare euery one al beleued together actu 4 thynges commune ſolde theyr poſſeſſions ſubſtaunces parted thē vnto euery one euery one nede cō tinuynge daylye one mynded temple eſaye 58 b breakynge bread houſes toke meate wyth ioye ſyngleneſſe harte prayſynge god together hauyng fauoure wyth people lorde ioyned dayly vnto ſhulde ſaued iii chapter peter ihon wente vp tēple ye nynthe houre prayer certayne man whyche halte frō hys mother wombe borne whome ſet daylye gate temple whyche called bewtyfull myght axe almeſſe goer temple ſame whan ſaw peter ihon begynnynge entre temple axed myghte receaue almeſſe peter wyth ihon beholdynge hym ſayd loke v loked hopynge ſhulde haue receaued ſome thyng peter ſayd syluer gold haue yt haue geue iohā 4 name ieſus chriſt nazareth ryſe walke hys ryght hande taken lyfte hym vp ſtrayght waye hys legges fete ſtrengthed leapynge ſtode walked entred temple wyth walkynge leapynge prayſynge god people ſawe walkynge praiſyng god knew hym yt y• ſat almeſſe bewtyful gate tēple fylled wt wonderynge aſtonnyed vpon ſame happened vnto hym whan people ſawe peter ihon wonderynge ranne vnto 3 reg 6 iohā 10 c actu 5 b porche whych called salomon peter ſeynge anſwered people ✚ ye men iſrael maruayle ye thys ye behold v though made ſame walke oure owne ſtrength power god abraham god iſaac god iacob god father hath glorifyed hys ſōne ieſus math 27 c luce 23 b whome ye truely haue delyuered denyed preſence pilate iudgynge hym lettē lowſe ye haue denyed holy ryghteous haue deſyred manſlayer geuen author lyfe haue ye ſlayen god hath rayſed deade whoſe wytneſſes fayth hys name hath hys name confirmed ſame whome ye ſe knowe fayth thorow hym hath geuē hym thys whole ſtrength ſyght brother knowe 1 cor 2 • thorowe ignoraunce ye haue done lyke ruler alſo thynges god ſhewed afore mouth hys prophetes hys chriſte ſhulde ſuffre hath ſo fulfylled repent therfore turned yt ecclī 17 b ſynnes may done away yt whan ye tyme refreſhyng ſhal come frō ye preſence ye lord ſende vnto ſame ieſus chriſt yt preached vnto verely muſt receaue heauē vntyll ye tyme reſtorynge agayne al thinges yt god hath ſpoken ye mouthe hys holy prophetes ſence ye begynnynge worlde ⊢ moſes truly dyd ſaye deut 18 c actu 7 • lorde god ſhal rayſe prophete amonge brethrē lyke vnto ſelfe hym ſhal ye heare accordyng thynges whatſoeuer ſhall ſpeake vnto ſhall come paſſe euery ſoule ſhall heare ſame prophete ſhalbe rooted people prophetes samuel thenceforth haue ſpoken haue ſhewed theſe dayes ye chyldren prophetes conuenaunte whych god hath made vnto father ſayenge vnto abraham gen 12 22 c thy ſede ſhal al kynreds ye earth bleſſed math 10 vnto hath god rayſyng ſōne ſent fyrſt bleſſyng euery man turne hymſelfe hys wyckedneſſe iiii chapter bvt ſpake vnto people preſtes ruler temple saduces came vnto thē beynge greued taught people ſhewed reſurreccion deade ieſu layed hā de put holde tyll morowe euē tyde howbeit many yt herd worde dyd beleue nombre men fyue thouſande chaunced ye morow theyr ruler elder ſcribes gathered ieruſalem anna alſo ye hygh preſt caiphas ihon alexāder many preſtes kynred ſettynge myddeſt axed math • 1 • power name haue ye done thys ✚ peter fylled wyth holy gooſt ſayd vnto ye ruler people elder iſrael yf thys daye examined ye good dede ſycke man whereby made whole knowen vnto vnto al people iſrael actu 3 • name oure lorde ieſus chriſte nazareth ye haue crucifyed whome god hath rayſed deade ſame ſtandeth whole pſal 117 c math 21 c 1 pet 2 thys ſtone whyche refuſed buylders whych become head corner ther ſaluacion ony math 1 c phili 2 • nother ther ony name geuen vnto men vnder heauen wherein ought ſaued ⊢ ſeynge peter ſtedfaſtneſſe ihons beynge ſure men wythout learnynge laye maruayled ſore knew ben wyth ieſu ſeynge wyth alſo man ſtandynge made whole coulde ſaye nothynge agaynſte cōmaunded go aſyde ye coūcel reaſoned together ſayenge ioh • 1 • ſhall vnto theſe men truely done token knowen al inhabiters ieruſalē manifeſt denye leſt noyſed abrode amōge people let v threaten ſpeake nomore vnto ony man name actu 5 c callynge charged wyſe ſhulde ſpeake teache name ieſus peter ihō anſwerynge ſayd vnto whether ryghte ſyght god rather heare thā god iudge ye ſpeake haue ſene herde threatenynge let go fyndynge myght punyſh thē becauſe people al mē prayſed whych actu • ben done happened man whome thys token health happened forty yeare olde beynge let go came theyrs ſhewed great thynges hygh preſtes elder ſaid vnto thē whych whā herde lyft vp theyr voyce wyth one accord vnto god ſayd lorde god thou haſt made heauen earth ſee thynges thē whych holy gooſt thorowe mouth oure father dauid thy ſeruaunte haſt ſayd pſal 2 wherfore haue heythen raged people haue ymagined vayne thynges kynges earth ſtode ruler agreed one againſt lorde agaynſt hys chriſte verely herode poncius pilate wyth heythen people iſraell come together thys cytie agaynſte thy holy chylde ieſus whome thou haſt anoynted thyne hande thy counſel haue determined done lorde loke vpon theyr threatenynges graunte vnto thy ſeruauntes ſpeake thy worde wyth confidēce thou reach thyne hande healynges token wōders done name thy holy chylde ieſus actu 16 whā prayed ye place gathered moued actu 2 • 19 • fylled wyth holy gooſt ſpake worde god wyth boldneſſe ✚ actu • c 5 b multitude beleuers ther one harte one ſoule nother ſaid ony mā ought hys thoſe thinges poſſeſſed al thynges commune wyth great power dyd apoſtles beare wytneſſe reſurreccion oure lord ieſus chriſt ther great grace nother ther ony wanted amonge thē ſo many poſſeſſers landes houſes ſellyng brought ye pryces thē yt ſolde layed thē ye apoſtles fete vnto euery mā diſtributed euery mā nede ⊢ actu 1 • ioſeph alſo ſurnamed barnabas ye apoſtles whych interpreted ye ſon cōſolaciō leuite ye cōtry cypre whā lande ſolde brought ye pryce layed ye apoſtles fete v chapter bvt certayne mā name ananias wt saphira hys wyfe ſolde felde kepte away parte ye mony hys wyfe beynge acoūſel therof bryngynge one part layed apoſtles fete peter ſayd ananias ananias wherfore hath ſatanas tempted thy hart thou ſhuldeſt lye vnto holy gooſt wythdrawe pryce ye feld dyd vnſold wholy remayne vnto beynge ſolde thy power haſt yu ſet thys thynge thyne harte thou haſte lyed vnto men vnto god ananias hearynge theſe wordes fel downe dyed ther happened great feare vpō thē yt dyd heare yonge men ryſynge vp hym awaye bearyng buryed hym fortuned ye ſpace nearehāde thre houres wyfe knowynge happened came alſo peter ſayde vnto tell woman dyd ye ſell lande ſomuch ſhe ſayd yee ſo much peter ſayd vnto ye ſo agre tempt ſprete ye lorde beholde ye fete yt haue buryed thy huſbande ye dore ſhal beare alſo immediatly ſhe fell hys fete dyed ye yonge mē entring dyd fynde deade caryed buryed hir huſbande ther happened great feare whole congregacion herde marc 16 c ther many token wonder done apoſtles handes amonge ye people wyth one accorde 3 regū 6 iohā 10 c actu 3 b salomon porche none durſt ioyne hymſelfe vnto people magnifyed multitude men wemen beleuynge lorde augmented inſomuch put forth ye ſycke vpon ſtretes layed vpon beddes barowes peter came hys ſhadowe ye leeſt myght ouerſhadowe ſome thē myght delyuered theyr diſeaſes ther came runnynge together ieruſalem multitude cyties laye thereby bryngyng ſycke vexed wyth vnclene ſpretes whych healed actu 4 • hygh preſt ryſyng vp ye wyth hym whych ſecte ye saduces fylled wyth enuye layde hādes apoſtles put thē ye cōmune warde actu 1 • b 16 angel ye lord openynge dores preſon nyght leadynge ſayde go ye ſtandynge ſpeake ye temple vnto people al wordes thys lyfe whych whā herd entred early ye temple taught cōmynge hygh preſt yt wyth hym called together coūcell elder chyldren iſrael dyd ſende vnto preſō yt ſhulde brought whan miniſters came preſon beynge opened dyd fynde beynge returned ſhewed ſayeng preſon dede dyd fynde ſhut wt diligence kepers ſtādyng dores openynge founde noman therein whan ruler temple hygh preſt herd theſe wordes douted wolde become thoſe thinges one cōmynge ſhewed behold men whych ye haue put ye preſon ſtandynge temple teachynge people wente ruler wt miniſters brought thē wythout force math 21 • feared people leſt ſhuld ſtoned whā brought thē ſet thē ye coūcel hygh preſt axed ſayenge actu 4 b dyd earneſtly commaunde ye ſhulde teach thys name beholde ye haue fylled ieruſalē wt doctrine wyl brynge math 27 e bloud thys man vpon v peter ye apoſtles anſweryng ſayde actu 4 b ought obeye god thā men god father hath rayſed ieſus ye haue ſlayne hāgynge hym tre ſame prince saueoure hath god exalted wt hys ryghthande geue repentaūce vnto iſrael forgeueneſſe ſynnes ar wytneſſes theſe wordes holy gooſt whome hath geuen vnto obey hym whan herde theſe thynges cut aſunder thought ſlaye phariſe name actu 22 gamaliel ryſynge vp councell doctor lawe honorable vnto people cōmaūded apoſtles go forth lytle one ſyde ſayd vnto ye men iſrael take hede vnto youre ſelfe concernynge theſe mē ye ſhall afore theſe dayes ther theudas ſayenge hymſelfe ſome one vnto whome dyd agre nombre foure hūdreth mē whych ſlayne beleued hym ſcattered brought naughte thys ther luce 13 iudas galilean dayes taxe turned away people hym peryſhed many conſented vnto hym ſcattered ſaye vnto wythdrawe frō theſe men let alone • l • 〈…〉 math • • yf thys counſell worke men ſhalbe lowſed yf god ye ſhall able lowſe leſte perchaunce ye ſhall ſeme ſtryue agaynſt god thā agreed vnto hym callynge together ye apoſtles cōmaūded thē math 2 • c actu 4 b beynge beaten ye nowyſe ſhuld ſpeake name ieſu let thē go verely wente math 5 reioycynge frō ye preſence ye coūcel yt coūted worthy ſuffre rebuke ye name ieſus ceaſſed teachyng preachyng ieſus chriſt tēple aboute ye houſes euery daye vi chapter thoſe dayes nō bre ye diſciples growing ther hapned grudge grekes agaynſt ye hebrues becauſe yt theyr wedowes wer deſpyſed dayly handreachyng twelfe callyng together ye multitude ye diſciples ſayd mete v leaue worde god ſerue table spye therfore brethrē amōg ſeuē 1 tim 4 b • good reporte ful ye holy gooſt wyſedom whō may ſet ouer worke wyll diligente prayer miniſtracion worde ſayeng pleaſed al multitude dyd choſe steuen mā ful fayth ye holy gooſt philippe prochorus nicanor timon parmenas apoc 2 nicolaus ſtraunger antioche num 27 b actu▪ 1 1 tim 4 b 2 tim 1 b theſe ſet apoſtles prayenge layd theyr handes vpon worde god increaced nombre diſciples multiplied greatly ieruſalem great company alſo preſtes dyd obey fayth ✚ steuen full fayth power dyd great token wonder amonge people aroſe ther ſome ſynagoge called lybertines cyrenenſes alexandrine cilicia aſia diſputinge wt steuen luce 21 b coulde reſyſte wyſedome ſprete ſpake ſent preuely men whych ſhulde ſaye math 26 f thē haue herde hym ſpeake wordes blaſphemy agaynſt moſes god thā moued ye people ye elder ſcribes runnynge together caught hym brought hym councel ſet falſe wytneſſes whych ſhulde ſay thys mā ceaſſeth ſpeake wordes agaynſt holy place lawe haue herde hym ſayenge ieſus nazareth ſhal deſtroy thys place ſhal chaūge tradiciōs moſes hath geuen vnto v ſat coūcel beholdynge hym ſawe hys face face angel vii chapter ſayd ye hygh preſt theſe thynges ſo whyche ſayd ye mē brethrē father herkē god glorye dyd appeare vnto father abraham whan meſopotamia afore dwelte ye lande charran ſayd vnto hym get thy lande thy kynred come lande ſhall ſhewe geneſi 11 • went lande caldees dwelt charran geneſ 1 • frō thence yt hys father deade broughte hym ouer thys lande dwel gaue hym heretage therein bredth foote gene 13 • promyſed geue hym poſſeſſion hys ſede hym whan chylde god ſayd vnto hym geneſ 15 c thy ſede ſhalbe indweller ſtraunge lande ſhall make ſubiecte bō dage ſhall intreate euell foure hundreth yeare ye people whome ſhall ſerue ſhall iudge ſayeth lorde therafter ſhall go ſerue thys place gen 17 b gaue hym conuenaunt circumciſion ſo gene 21 begat iſaac circūciſed eyght daye gone 25 c iſaac iacob iacob gene 29 f xii patriarkes gen • 7 e sap • 0 c ye patriarkes enuyenge ioſeph ſolde hym egipte god wyth hym ryd hym al tribulacions gaue hym grace wyſedom preſence pharao kynge ye egipcians gene 41 c ordyned hym geuernoure ouer egipte ouer hys houſe gene 41 • 4 • ther came derth al egipte chanaan great trouble oure father fande meates whā iacob herde corne egipte ſente fyrſt father gene 45 • ſeconde tyme ioſeph knowen hys brother hys kynred made knowen vnto pharao ieſeph ſendynge called father iacob hys kynred thre ſcore fyftene ſoules gene 46 iacob wēt downe egipte gene 49 e dyed father gene 50 c ioſu 24 f caryed ouer sichem layed sepulchre whych gene 23 abraham bought mony chyldrē emor ſōne sichem exod 1 pſal 104 c whan tyme promyſe drue nye whyche god confeſſed vnto abraham people dyd growe multiplyed egipt vntyl ther aroſe another kyng egipt knewe ioſeph ſame dealynge ſutely wt kynred intreated father euel ſhuld put forth theyr yonge chyldren leſte ſhulde made lyue exod 2 ſame tyme moſes borne accepte vnto god whyche noryſhed thre monethes father houſe whan put forth pharaos doughter toke vp •••• riſhed ſōne herſelfe moſes taught al ye wyſedō ye egipciās myghtye hys wordes workes whā ye tyme forty yeare fulfilled vnto came vp hys mynde viſite brethrē ye chyldren iſrael whā ſene one ſuffrynge iniury delyuered hym auenged ye ſuffr • wronge ſmytynge ye egipciā thought brethrē vnderſtād yt god dyd geue thē health hāde vnderſtode ye nexte daye ſhewed hymſelf vnto thē chydyng dyd recō cyle thē peace ſayeng ye men ye brother ye hurte eche yt dyd hys neghboure wronge thruſt hym awaye ſayenge exodi 2 bwho hath ordyned ruler iudge ouer v wylt yu ſlaye thou ſleweſt ye egipcian yeſterday moſes fled thys worde became ſtraūger ye lāde madiā engēdred two ſōnes exodi 3 • fortye yeares beynge fulended ther appeared vnto hym wylderneſſe mounte sina angel ye fyre flame ye buſh moſes ſeynge maruayled ye ſyght whan came neare myght beholde voyce lord happened vnto hym ſayenge god thy father god abraham god iſaac god iacob moſes beynge afeared durſt beholde lorde ſayd vnto hym ioſue 5 lowſe ſhewe thy fete place wherin yu ſtandeſt holy lande haue wel ſene trouble people whyche egipte haue herde theyr gronynge come downe delyuer come wyll ſende egipte thys ſame moſes refuſed ſayeng exod 2 bwho made ruler iudge ſame hath god ſente ruler redymer wyth hande angell appeared vnto hym buſhe ſame brought thē doynge great token wonder lande egipte ye reed ſee deſerte forty yeare ſame moſes ſayd vnto chyldren iſraell deut 18 c actu 3▪ prophete ſhal god rayſe brethrē lyke vnto ye ſhall heare hym exodi 19 gala 3 c ſame whych cōgregacyon ye wylderneſſe wyth angell ſpake vnto hym mounte sina wyth father whych receaued wordes lyfe geue vnto vnto whome oure father wolde obey refuſed turned awaye wyth theyr harte egipte ſayenge vnto aarō exod 32 amake vnto v goddes maye go v moſes led v lande egipte tel done vnto hym made calfe thoſe dayes offred ſacrifice vnto ye ymage reioyced workes theyr handes god turned rom 1 gaue ſerue vnto hooſt heauen wrytten boke prophetes haue ye offred meate offerynges ſacrifices forty yeares wylderneſſe iere 7 c amos 5 ye houſe iſrael ye haue takē vp tabernacle moloch ye ſtarre god rempham fygures ye haue made worſhippe wyl brynge ouer beyonde babilon tabernacle wytneſſe wyth oure father deſerte god dyd appoynt thē exodi 25 hebr 8 ſpeakyng vnto moſes yt ſhulde make faſhion ſene father takyng vp ioſue▪ 3 broughte alſo wyth ioſue poſſeſſion heythen whych god droue preſēce father vntyl ye dayes dauid pſa • 88 whyche founde fauoure wyth god deſyred myght fynde tabernacle vnto god iacob 3 reg 6 • salomon buylte hym houſe actu 17 howbeit hygheſt dwelleth temple made wyth handes ſayeth prophete eſai 66 • heauen ſeate vnto earth ſtoole fete houſe ſhall ye buylde ſayeth lorde whych place reſt hath hande made al theſe thynges deut 9 ye ſtyfnecked vncircumciſed harte eares ye haue alwaye wythſtande ye holy gooſt father euen ſo ye alſo whome ye prophetes haue father perſecuted haue ſlayne dyd ſhewe afore commynge ryghteous whoſe traytours murthurers ye haue bene iohā 7 b whych haue receaued law diſpoſicion angel actu 15 b ye haue kepte hearynge theſe thynges cut aſūder theyr harte gnaſhed theyr teth whan full holy gooſte lokynge heauen math 16 c ſawe ye glorye god ieſus ſtandynge ryghthāde power god ſayd beholde ſe heauens open ſonne mā ſtandynge ryghthande power god cryenge oute wyth loude voyce pſal 57 helde theyr eares made ruſhynge wt one accorde vpon hym puttyng hym forth cytie ſtoned hym actu •• b wytneſſes layed downe theyr clothes fete yonge man whych called saule ſtoned steuen cryenge ſayeng lorde ieſu pſal 3 • • receaue ſprete hys knee beyng bowed cryed wyth loude voyce ſayenge luce 2 • c lorde laye ſynne theyr charge whan hadde ſayd fell aſlepe ⊢ saule conſentynge vnto hys death viii chapter daye ther happened great perſecuciō cōgregacion ieruſalem mat 22 c actu 11 22 ſcattered abrode contrye iewry samaria • excepte apoſtles mē feared god dreſſed steuen made great lamentacion ouer actu 9 22 26 b 1 cor 15 gala 1 b saul wayſted ye cōgregaciō ētryng thorowe houſes drawynge men wemen delyuered vnto iayle therfore actu 11 b ſcattered abrode went thorow preachynge ye worde god ✚ philippe goynge downe cytie samaria preached chriſte vnto ye people gaue hede one accorde vnto thoſe thinges ſpoken philippe hearynge ſeynge token dyd ye vncleane ſprets many thē cryenge wyth loude voyce marc 10 c actu 5 bthey wente many hauynge palſye haltynge healed therfore ther great ioye happened vnto cytie certayne man name simon actu 13 awhych vſed wytchcrafte cytie myſcaryenge people samaria ſayenge hymſelfe ſome great man vnto whome euery man herkened leeſt greateſt ſayenge thys power god whych called greate gaue hede vnto hym becauſe great ſeaſō made fooles wyth hys wytchcraftes whan beleued philippe preachyng kingdome god baptyſed name ieſu chriſt men wemen thā beleued simon hymſelfe alſo whā baptyſed dyd cleue vnto philippe ſeynge alſo greate token power done beynge aſtonnyed dyd wonder ⊢ ✚ whā apoſtles ieruſalē herde samaria receaued worde god ſente vnto peter ihon whych whan come prayed yt myght receaue ye holy gooſt yet come ony thē onely baptyſed ye name ye lord ieſus actu 13 19 1 tim 4 b 5 c 2 tim 1 b thā layde theyr hādes thē receaued holy gooſt ⊢ whā simō ſene yt holy gooſt geuē layeng ye apoſtles hādes offred thē mony ſayenge geue alſo power y• vpō whō ſo euer ſhal laye hādes may receaue ye holy gooſt peter ſayd vnto thy mony wt vnto perdiciō becauſe yu haſt thought math 10 b gyft god poſſeſſed wt mony thou haſt part fellowſhip worde thy hart ryght god repēt therfore thys thy wyckedneſſe pray god yf haply thys thought thy hart forgeuē ye perceaue yt ye gal bytterneſſe ye bōde wyckedneſſe simon anſwerynge ſayde num • 21 b praye ye vnto lorde nothynge come vnto theſe thynges ye haue ſayd verely hauynge teſtifyed ſpoken worde wente agayne ieruſalem preached goſpell vnto many partyes samaritanes ✚ angell lorde ſpake vnto philippe ſayenge ryſe vp go towarde south vnto waye commeth downe frō ieruſalem vnto gaza • ame deſerte ryſynge vp wente beholde man ethiopia gelded man mā authorite wyth candace quene ethiopia whych ouer hyr treaſures 3 reg 8 fwas come worſhippe ieruſalem returned ſyttynge vpō charret readynge eſay prophete ſprete ſayd vnto philip go neare ioyne charret philippe runnynge neare herde hym reade prophete eſaye ſayd thynkeſt thou thou doeſt vnderſtande thou readeſt whych ſayd howe yf man ſhewe prayed philippe wolde come vp ſyt wyth hym place ſcripture whych red thys eſai 53 b led ſhepe ſlaughter lambe wythout voyce hym ſheareth hym ſo hath opened hys mouth humblyneſſe hys iudgement exalted ſhall declare generacion hys lyfe ſhalbe taken earth gelded man anſwerynge philippe ſayd praye whome ſayeth prophete hymſelf another philippe openynge mouth begynnynge thys ſcripture preached ieſus vnto hym whan wente waye came certayne water ye gelded man ſayd beholde water actu 10 • hyndereth baptyſed philippe ſayde yf thou beleueſt wyth thy harte may anſwerynge ſayd beleue ieſus chriſt ſonne god commaunded charret ſtande ſtyll wente water philippe gelded man baptyſed hym whan gone vp water ſprete ye lord caught philippe gelded man ſawe hym nomore wente hys way reioycyng philippe founde azotus goynge thorow preached vnto al cyties vntyll came ceſarea ⊢ ix chapter ✚ saule actu 26 b 1 cor 15 gala 1 b breathyng yet threatenynges ſlaughter agaynſte diſciples lorde cam ye hygh preſte axed letter hym damaſcus vnto ſynagoges yt yf founde ony thys waye men wemen myght brynge bounde ieruſalem whan iournyed fortuned came neare damaſcus ſodēly dyd lyght heauen ſhyne rounde aboute hym fallynge ye groūde herde voyce ſayenge vnto hym saule saule 4 19 perſecuteſt thou mezach 2 b math • 5 ſayd art thou lorde ſayd ieſus whome thou perſecuteſt harde kycke agaynſt prycke quakynge beyng aſtonnyed ſayde lorde actu 2 16 wylt thou haue lorde ſayd vnto hym aryſe go cytie ſhalbe tolde thou muſte men accōpanyed wyth hym ſtode amaſed hearynge dede voyce ſeynge noman saul roſe vp earth eye opened dyd ſe nothynge leadynge hym hande brought hym damaſcus thre dayes ſeynge dyd eat drynke ther damaſcus diſciple name ananias lorde ſayd vnto hym viſion ananias ſayd beholde lorde lorde ſayde vnto hym aryſe go ſtrete called ſtraight ſeke ye houſe iudas one name saule actu 21 c 22 tharſis beholde prayeth hath ſene man name ananias entrynge layenge handes vpon hym may receaue hys ſyght ananias anſwered lorde haue herde many man actu 8 many euels hath done thy ſayntes ieruſalem hath power frō hygh preſtes bynde al whych call vpō thy name lorde ſayde vnto hym go thy way gala 1 c thys choſen veſſell vnto may carye name heythen kynges chyldren iſraell wyll ſhewe hym howe greate thynges muſt actu 21 b • corī 11 c ſuffre name ſake ac • •• • ananias went waye entred houſe layenge hys handes vpon hym ſayde brother saule lorde ieſus whyche appeared vnto waye thou cameſt ſente thou ſe fylled wyth ye holy gooſt forthwyth fell hys eye ben ſkales receaued ſyght ryſynge baptyſed whan taken meate cōforted ſome dayes wyth diſciples damaſcus ſtrayghte waye beynge entred ſynagoges preached ieſus ſonne god herde hym aſtōnyed ſayd thys droue ieruſalem called vpon name cam hether therfore myght leade bounde vnto ye hygh preſtes saule much ſtrengthed confoūded iewes dwelte damaſcus affirmynge thys chriſt ⊢ whan many dayes fulfylled iewes helde councel together yt might kil theyr layeng wayte made knowē vnto saule • cor 11 kept gate daye nyght myght ſlaye hym ioſue 2 c 1 regū 9 c diſciples takyng nyght let hym thorow wall puttynge hym baſket gala 2 band whan come ieruſalem aſſayed ioyne hymſelfe vnto diſciples euery one feared hym beleuyng diſciple barnabas takynge hym led hym apoſtles ſhewed ſene lorde waye ſpake vnto hym done boldely name ieſus damaſcus wyth goynge ieruſalem doynge boldely name lorde ſpake vnto heythen diſputed wyth grekes ſought ſlaye hym ac • u 22 b whyche whan brother knowen conueyed hym ceſarea ſent hym tharſus ye cōgregaciō verely reſte thorow iewry galile samaria edifyed walkynge feare lord fylled comforte holy gooſt fortuned whan peter paſſed euery one dyd come vnto ſayntes yt dwelled lydda fande certayne man name eneas lyenge eyght yeare hys bed whych ſycke palſye peter ſayd vnto hym eneas lorde ieſus chriſt make whole aryſe decke bedde vnto thyſelfe math 9 marc 2 luce 5 c ioh 5 ſtrayght waye aroſe al dwelte lydda sarone ſaw hym whych turned vnto lorde ioppe ther certayne woman diſciple name thabita interpreted called dorcas ſame ful good workes almeſſes whyche ſhe dyd happened thoſe dayes ſhe beynge ſycke dyd dye whych whan waſhen layde parloure ſeynge lydda nye ioppe ye diſciples hearynge peter therein ſente two men vnto hym prayenge let greue come vnto v peter ryſyng vp came wyth whā come brought hym ye parloure wedowes ſtode aboute hym wepynge ſhewyng hym coates garmentes dorcas dyd make put forth peter knelyng prayed beynge turned bodye ſaid thabita ariſe ſhe opened hyr eye peter beynge ſene ſhe ſat vp geuynge hande lyfte vp whan called ſayntes wedowes ſhewed alyue made knowen thorow al ioppe many beleued lorde fortuned taryed many dayes ioppe one simon coryar x chapter ✚ ther certayne man ceſarea name cornelius centurion cōpany called italian deuoute man fearynge god wyth hys houſe ecclī • 7 bgeuynge many almeſſes vnto people prayenge god alwaye ſame ſawe manifeſtly viſion nearehande nynth houre daye angell god cōmynge vnto hym ſayenge vnto hym cornelius lokynge vpon hym beynge takē wt feare ſaid art thou lord ſayd vnto hym eccli▪ 15 b thy prayer thyne almeſſes come vp remēbraūce ſyght god ſende men ioppe cal one simō whych ſurnamed peter ſame lodged wt one simon tāner whoſe houſe neare ye ſee ſame ſhall tell behoueth ye whan angel yt ſpake vnto hym departed called ii hys houſehold ſoldyoure fearynge god obeyed whomwhā ſhewed al thynges ſente ioppe ye next day neynge cōmynge neare ye cytie peter 4 reg 4 math 6 luc • 6 b went vp ye lofte myght praye ſyxte houre whā dyd hūger wolde eat made ready fell traunce ſawe heauen open certayne veſſel cōmyng downe lyke vnto great lynnen clothe wt foure endes letten downe frō heauē ye earth wherein al foure footed beaſtes crepynge beaſtes earth byrdes ye ayre ther happened voyce vnto hym ryſe peter kyll eate peter ſayd fro lord • ui • 11 deu • 14 neuer dyd eate al yt cōmune vncleane agayne ye ſecōde tyme ſpake voyce hym math 15 b rom 14 b 2 tim 4 ti •• 1 • call thou commune ye god hath puryfyed thys happened thryſe anone ye veſſel taken vp agayne heauē whā peter douted hymſelfe ye viſion yt ſene beholde ye men yt ſente frō cornelius enquyring ye houſe simō ſtode ye dore whan called axed whether simō yt ſurnamed peter ther hys lodgynge whā peter thought vpon viſion ſprete ſayd vnto hym beholde thre mē ſeke ye aryſe therfore go downe wyth thē doutynge nothynge haue ſent thē peter going ye mē ſaid beholde whō ye ſeke cauſe wherfore ye come whych ſayd cornelius centurio ryghteous mā fearyng god hauynge good reporte al people iewes hath receaued anſwere holy angel cal ye hys houſe heare wordes wherfore gene 19 24 1 pet 4 b leadynge lodged thē ryſynge vp next daye wente wt act 1 • • ſome brother ioppe dyd beare hym cōpany ye daye followyng entred ceſarea cornelius hys kynſfolkes ſpeciall frēdes beynge called together wayted thē fortuned whan peter come cornelius met hym fallynge downe hys fete worſhipped hym peter lyfted vp ſayenge actu 14 c apoc 19 b 22 b ryſe vp myſelfe mā alſo ſpeakynge wt hym entred fāde many come together ſayd vnto ye knowe deut 7 abhorred iewe ioyned come aleaunte god hath ſhewed call nomā cōmune vncleane wherfore beynge called dyd come wythout doutynge axe therfore cauſe haue ye called cornelius ſayde fourth daye hence faſted vntyll thys houre prayenge nynth houre houſe beholde man ſtode whyte garmente ſayd cornelius thy prayer herde thyne almeſſes remēbraunce ſyght god sende therfore ioppe call simon whych ſurnamed peter ſame lodged houſe simō tāner ſee therfore ſente continently vnto thou haſt done well commynge therfore thy preſence heare thynges commaunded ye lorde ✚ peter openynge hys mouth ſayde deut 10 2 par 19 b iob 34 b sap 6 b eccli 6 b rom 2 b epheſi 6 colloſſ 3 c 1 petri 1 c haue founde truth ye god accepter perſōs eſa 56 bbut amonge people yt feareth hym worketh ryghteouſneſſe accepte vnto hym god ſente ye worde vnto ye chyldren iſrael preachyng peace thorow ieſu chriſte ye lorde ye knowe worde happened thorow al iewry math 4 bfor begynnynge galile ye baptyme ihon preached ieſus nazareth eſa 61 god anoynted hym wyth holy gooſt power whych paſſed thorowe doynge good healynge al poſſeſſed wyth deuell god wyth hym wytneſſes thoſe thynges dyd lande iewry ieruſalem ſlewe hangynge tre ſame dyd god rayſe thyrde day gaue hym become manifeſte vnto al people vnto v wytneſſes ordyned god luce 24 iohā 21 bwhich haue eaten receaue forgeueneſſe ſynnes hys name beleue hym ⊢ whyle peter ſpake theſe wordes actu • • holy gooſt fell vpon al herde worde faythfull circumciſion yt come wyth peter aſtonnyed grace holy gooſt alſo poured forth vpon heythen herde ſpeakynge tunges prayſynge god anſwered peter actu 8 ony mā byd water theſe baptyſed whych haue receaued holy gooſt commaūded baptyſed name ieſus chriſte ⊢ prayed hym wolde tary certayne dayes wyth xi chapter apoſtles brother iewry herde yt heythen alſo receaued worde god whan peter come vp ieruſalem circumciſion diſputed wt hym ſayenge deut 7 awhy art yu gone vnto mē yt haue forſkynne haſt eaten wt peter begynnyng declared order ſayeng actu 10 cytie ioppe prayenge ſawe viſion traunce certayne veſſellyke vnto greate lynnen cloth foure corner let downe frō heauē came vntyl whereon lokyng perceaued ſaw fourefooted beaſtes ye earth wylde beaſtes crepynge beaſtes flyenge beaſtes ayre herde alſo voyce ſayenge vnto ryſe vp peter ſlaye eate ſayd lord al yt leuit 11 deut 14 cōmune vncleane dyd neuer entre mouth ye voyce frō heauen anſwered ye ſeconde tyme ſayenge thoſe thynges god hath clēſed yu call vncleane thys happened thre tymes al thynges receaued vp agayne heauen beholde cōtinently ther ſtode thre mē ye houſe ſente vnto frō ceſarea ye ſprete ſaid vnto yt ſhulde go wt thē doutynge nothynge actu 10 c ther came wt alſo theſe ſyxe brethrē dyd entre mās houſe ſhewed v ſene houſe angel ſtādynge ſayeng vnto hym sēde vnto ioppe cal simō ſurnamed peter ſhal ſpeake wordes vnto ye yt yu ſhalt ſafe yu al thy houſe whan begon ſpeake ye holy gooſt fel vpon thē actu 2 vpō v alſo ye begynnynge remēbred ye worde lord ſayd actu 1 ihon verely dyd baptyſe wt water ye ſhalbe baptyſed wyth ye holy gooſt yf god therfor haue geuē thē lyke grace alſo vnto v haue beleued lord ieſus chriſt yt myght wythſtande god theſe thynges beyng herd held theyr peace prayſed god ſayeng hath god geuē vnto ye heythen alſo repētaūce vnto lyfe actu 8 truly ſcattred abrode frō ye trouble whych happened vnder steuen walked thorow vntyl phenice cipres antioche ſpeakynge ye worde vnto noman ſaue iewes ſome men cypers cyrene whā entred antioche ſpake vnto grekes ſhewynge lorde ieſus ye hande lorde wt greate nōbre beleuers dyd turne vnto ye lorde worde theſe thynges came ye eares ye cōgregaciō yt ieruſalem ſente barnabas vntyll antioche whych whā came ſawe ye grace god reioyced actu 15 c exhorted euery one purpoſe harte abyde ye lorde good man full ye holy gooſt faith ther much people added vnto lorde actu 9 went tharſus yt myght ſeke saule whā foūde brought hym antioche cō uerſaunt cōgregacion whole yeare taught much people inſomuch ye diſciples fyrſt called chriſtians antioche theſe dayes came ther prophetes frō ieruſalem vnto antioche ryſynge vp one name actu 21 b agabus ſhewed ſprete great derth come whole cōpaſſe worlde whyche happened vnder claudius diſciples purpoſed euery one ſende 1 cor 16 2 corī 8 9 handreachynge vnto brother iewry euery man whyche dyd alſo ſendynge vnto actu 12 elder hā de barnabas saule xii chapter ✚ ſame tyme layd herode kynge handes myghte vexe certayne congregaciō ſlewe math 4 c 17 20 c 26 iames brother ihon wyth ſwearde ſeynge pleaſed iewes thought take peter alſo dayes ſwete breade whome whan taken put hym preſon delyueryng hym vnto foure quaternio captayne iiii ſouldyers centurio hundreth quaternion ſouldyours kepe hym wyllynge eaſter brynge hym forth vnto ye people peter truly kepte ye preſon actu 4 c prayer made wythout ceaſſynge congregacion vnto god hym whan herode ſhulde haue broughte hym forth ſame nyght peter ſlepynge betwene two ſouldyours bounde wyth two cheynes ye kepers dore kepte preſō actu 5 c 16 dand behold angel lorde ſtode lyght ſhyned dwellyng peter ſyde ſmytten waked hym ſayenge ryſe vp quyckely cheynes fell hys handes angell ſayd vnto hym gyrde pul thy hoſen dyd ſo ſayd vnto hym put thy garmente aboute followe goyng followed hym knewe true done angell thoughte hym haue ſene ſyght goynge fyrſt ſeconde watch came vnto yrō gate whych leadeth vnto ye cytie whych opened alone vnto goynge wente one ſtrete ſodenlye wente angel hym peter beynge come hymſelfe ſayde gene 28 dani 6 dnow know truly god hath ſente hys angell hath delyuered hande herode waytynge people iewes▪ ⊢ conſyderynge came houſe mary mother ihon whych ſurnamed marke many gathered actu 1 band prayenge knocked entry dore ther came forth dameſell name rhode ſe whan ſhe knewe peter voyce ioye dyd ſhe open dore runnynge ſhe ſhewed peter ſtāde dore ſayd vnto thou art mad ſhe affirmed ſo ſayd angell peter continued knockynge whan opened dore ſawe hym aſtonnyed actu 13 b beckenynge vnto wyth hande ſhulde holde theyr peace ſhewed lorde led hym forth preſon ſayd ſhewe theſe thynges vnto actu 15 b 21 b iames brother beynge gone oute wente vnto another place whan become daye ther ſmal buſyneſſe amonge ſouldyours become peter whan herode ſought hym founde hym inquiſiciō beynge made kepers commaunded led awaye goynge downe iewrye ceſarea abode wroth wyth tyre sidon came one mynded hym blaſtus kynges chamberlayne beynge perſunded deſyred peace becauſe theyr contryes noryſhed apointed daye dyd herode beynge arayed wyth kyngly garmente ſyt vpon iudgemente ſeate made oracion vnto thē people cryed therto voyce god man ſtrayght waye dyd angel lorde ſtryke hym becauſe geuen honoure vnto god beynge conſumed wormes gaue vp gooſt worde god dyd growe multiplyed barnabas saule dyd returne ieruſalem actu 1 • c hande reachynge beynge fulfylled takynge wyth actu 13 ihon ſurnamed marke xiii chapter ther congregacion antioche prophetes teacher amonge whych barnabas simon whych called niger lucius cyrene manahen whych herodes one foure prince norſefellowe saule ſerued lorde faſted holy gooſt ſayd vnto separate saul barnabas vnto worke actu 9 b vnto haue taken prayenge faſtynge layenge theyr handes vpon let go verely beynge ſent ye holy gooſt wente vnto seleucia thence ſayled cypers whan come salamina preached worde god ſinagoges iewes actu 1 • ▪ ihon ſeruice whan walked thorowe ile vntyl paphos fande certayn ſorcerer falſe prophet iewe whoſe name barieu whyche wt counſels debite sergius paule wyſe man ſame barnabas paule beynge called deſyred heare ye worde god elimas exod • b 8 b actu 8 • ſorcerer ſo name interpreted wythſtode ſekynge wythdrawe counſuls debite fayth saule whych alſo called paule fylled wyth ye holy gooſt lokynge vpō hym ſayd yu chyld deuel ful al gyle deceatfulneſſe chylde ye deuel enemy al ryghteouſnes doeſt thou ceaſſe ſubuert ye ſtrayght wayes ye lorde nowe beholde ye hāde ye lord vpō thou ſhalt blynde ſeynge sonne certayne tyme ſtrayght waye ther fell myſte vpō hym darkneſſe goynge ſought one whych ſhulde geue hym ye hāde ye coūſels debite whā ſene ye dede iohā 6 • beleued wō deringe doctrine ye lord whā paule ſayled frō paphos wt hym came perge pamphilia actu • 5 • ihon departynge frō thē returned ieruſalē paſſynge perge came antioche piſidia beyng gone ye ſynagoge vpō ye day ye ſabbats ſat downe ye lectur ye law prophetes ruler ſynagoge ſēde vnto thē ſayenge ye mē brother yf ye haue ony worde exhortacion vnto people ſpeake paule ſtandynge vp actu 12 commaundynge ſilence wyth hys hande ſayde ye iſraelityſh men ye fear god herken god ye people iſrael hath choſē father hath exalted ye people whan ſtraungers lande egypte exod 14 c hyghe arme led tyme forty yeare dyd ſuffre theyr maners deſerte deſtroyenge ſ • uen nacions ye lande chanaan ioſu 13 b diſtributed thē theyr lāde lot iu • 12 thys nearehande hū dreth fyfty yeares gaue iudges vntyl samuel prophete 1 regū 8 aand deſyred kyng 1 reg 10 aand gaue saul ſonne ci man tribe ben iamin forty yeare 1 reg 16 c hym beynge put downe rayſed vnto dauid kynge whome bearyng wytneſſe dyd ſaye pſal • 8 c haue founde dauid ſonne ieſſe man harte whych ſhall wylles thys man ſede 2 reg 7 c pſal 151 b accordyng ye promyſe hath god brought forth vnto iſrael saueour iesvs ihon preachyng preſence hys commyng baptyme penaunce vnto people iſrael whan ihon fulfylled courſe ſayd math 3 b ye ſuppoſe beholde commeth whoſe ſhues hys fete worthy lowſe ✚ ye men brother ye chyldren abraham kynred amonge feare god math 10 vnto worde thys health ſente dwelte ieruſalem hir ruler 1 cor 2 knowyng ſame▪ voyces ye prophetes red euery ſabbat iudgynge haue fulfylled thē luce 23 fyndynge cauſe death hym axed pilate myghte ſlaye hym whan fulfylled al thynges wrytten hym luce 23 ctakynge hym tre layed hym graue god rayſed oure father god hath fulfylled ye ſame vnto chyldren rayſynge ieſus chriſt alſo wrytten ſeconde pſalme pſal 2 heb 1 c thou art ſōne thys daye haue begottē yt hath rayſed hym deade hence forth nomore returne vnto corrupcion ſayeth thus eſay 55 ſhall geue holy conuenauntes dauid faythfully therfore ſayeth another place pſal 15 athou ſhalte geue thy holy one ſe corrupcion dauid hys generacion ſerued wyll god 3 regu 2 b fell aſlepe layed hys father ſawe corrupcion god rayſed deade ſawe corrupcion therfore knowen vnto ye men brother luce 24 thorowe ſame forgeueneſſe ſynnes ſhewed vnto al thynges wherin ye coulde iuſtifyed law moſes hym euery one beleueth iuſtifyed beware therfore come vpon ſayde prophetes aba • 2 beholde ye deſpyſers wonder peryſh worke dayes worke ye ſhal beleue yf ony man ſhall ſhewe wente prayed yt wolde ſpeake theſe wordes vnto thē vpon ſabbat followynge whan ſynagoge letten go many iewes many ſtraū gers ſeruynge god followed paule barnabas whych ſpeakyng actu 11 • exhorted thē ſhuld remayne grace god ✚ next ſabbat came together near hande whole cytie heare worde god iewes ſeyng people fylled wyth indignacion gaynſayd thoſe thynges ſpoken paule blaſphemynge thā ſayd paule barnabas boldely math 10 15 c vnto oughte fyrſt worde god ſpoken ſeynge ye refuſe iudge ſelfe vnworthy euerlaſtyng lyfe beholde math 21 • turned vnto ye heythen ſo hath lorde commaunded v eſai 49 b math 5 b luce 2 • haue ſet lyght vnto heythen thou saluacion vnto vtmooſt earth eſa 55 b heythen hearynge reioyced prayſed worde lorde dyd beleue many ordyned afore vnto lyfe euerlaſtynge worde lorde ſpred abrode thorowe region 2 tim 4 b iewes moued ye deuoute honeſt woman chefe cytie rayſed vp perſecucion agaynſte paule barnabas caſte forthe theyr coaſtes math 10 b marci 6 b luce 6 ſhakynge duſte theyr fete came iconium diſciples alſo fylled wyth ioye holy gooſt ⊢ xiiii chapter fortuned iconium wente together ſynagoge iewes ſpake inſomuche great multitude iewes grekes dyd beleue iewes whych vnbeleuynge rayſed ſteared ye ſoules heythē anger agaynſt brother therfore taryed great ſeaſō quytyng thēſelues boldely ye lorde bearyng wytneſſe ye word hys grace marci 16 c graūtyng token wōders done theyr handes ye multitude ye cytie diuided ſome truely wt iewes ſome wt apoſtles whā ther happened inſurreccion ye heythē iewes wt theyr ruler myght put ſhame ſtone thē perceauynge math 10 c fled vnto cyties lycaonia lyſ • ra derbe al contry rounde aboute preachynge goſpell ye multitude moued theyr doctrine paule barnabas dyd abyde lyſtra lyſtra certayne man weake hys fete ſat actu 3 acrepell hys mother wombe whych neuer walked ſame herde paule ſpeakynge lokynge vpon hym ſeynge fayth yt myght made whole ſayd wyth loude voyce ryſe vpryght vpon thy fete eſay 35 lept walked whan people ſawe paule done lyfte vp theyr voyce lycaonyſh ſpeche ſayenge actu 28 goddes become lyke vnto men come downe vnto v called barnabas iupiter paule mercury ſpechman ye word preſte alſo iupiter whyche cytie bryngynge oxē garlandes dores wolde haue done ſacrifice wyth people whych whā apoſtles barnabas paule herde rentynge theyr cote ranne people cryenge ſayenge actu 10 c apo 19 b 22 b ye men ye theſe thynges alſo mortall men lyke vnto ſhewynge turne awaye theſe vayne thynges lyuynge god pſal 145 actu 17 apoc 14 b whyche hathe made heauen earth ſee thynges whych tymes paſt ſuffered nacions walke theyr owne wayes rom 1 verely wythout wytneſſe hath lefte hym ſelfe doynge well geuynge rayne frutefull ſeaſons fyllynge theyr harte wyth meates ioye ſayenge thys ſcarce ſtylled people ſhulde offre vnto ther came certayne iewes antioche iconium people beynge perſuaded • co • • • ſtonyng paule dyd drawe cytie ſuppoſynge hym haue ben deade diſciples ſtandynge compaſſe aboute hym ryſynge vp wente cytie nexte daye wente wyth barnabas vnto derbe whan preached goſpell vnto cytie taughte many returned lyſtra iconiū antioche ſtrengthynge ſoules diſciples andactu • c 1 • c 13 • exhortynge ſhulde continue ye fayth luce 24 2 tim • b many tribulacions muſte entre kyngdome god whan ordyned elder thorowe euery congregaciō prayed wyth faſtynges commended vnto ye lorde whome dyd beleue goynge thorowe piſidia came vnto pamphilia ſpeakynge worde perge wente downe attalia thence ſayled antioche actu 15 frō whence delyuered vnto grace god worke whych fulfylled whan come gathered together congregacion ſhewed great thynges god done wyth thē opened dore fayth vnto ye heythen taryed lytle tyme wyth diſciples xv chapter certayne commynge iewry taught ye brother gala 5 wythout ye circumcyſed maner moſes ye ſaued whā ther therfore ſmall diſſenciō rayſed vnto paule barnabas agaynſt thē gala 2 ordyned y• paule barnabas ſome thē ſhulde go vp vnto apoſtles elder ieruſalem vpon thys queſtion therfore beyng brought theyr waye congregacion wente thorowe phenice samaria ſhewynge conuerſion heythē cauſed great ioye vnto brother whan come ieruſalem actu 21 b receaued congregacion apoſtles elder ſhewyng greate thynges god done wyth ther roſe ſome phariſes ſecte whych beleued ſayenge muſte circumciſed commaunde kepe lawe moſes apoſtles elder dyd come together loke vpon matter whan great triall made peter ryſyng vp ſayd vnto ye mē brother ye know god old dayes dyd choſe amōg v yt thorow mouth heythen ſhulde heare worde goſpell beleue god actu 1 knoweth harte dyd beare wytneſſe actu 10 e geuynge holy gooſt vnto v made diſcrecion betwene v thē purgynge theyr harte faythe nowe therfore tempte ye god laye yocke vpon diſciples neckes actu 7 g whych nother father coulde beare ephe 2 tit • 3 beleue ſaued grace oure lorde ieſus chriſte lyke alſo multytude helde theyre peace herde barnabas paule ſhewynge great token wonder god done amonge ye heythen yt held theyr peace actu 12 c 21 b iames anſwered ſayenge ye men brother herken vnto simon hath ſhewed howe god hath fyrſt viſited take people heythen vnto hys name vnto ſame agre wordes prophetes wrytten amos 9 c thys ſhall returne buylde agayne tabernacle dauid fallen downe ſhall buylde agayne hys decayes rayſe reſte men maye ſeke lorde heythen whyche name called vpon ſayeth lorde fornicacyon gen 9 ſtrangled bloude moſes hath olde tyme euery cytie whych preach hym ſynagoges red euery ſabbat pleaſed apoſtles elder wyth congregacion choſe men amonge ſende vnto antioche wyth paule barnabas ioh 14▪ b iudas ſurnamed barſabas silas principall men amonge brother wrytynge theyr hādes apoſtles elder brother wyſh health vnto brother heythen yt antioche syria cylicia gala 2 muche haue herde ſome goynge amonge v haue diſquieted ſubuertynge ſoules wyth wordes commaundynge circumciſed kepe lawe haue commaunded ſo hath pleaſed v beynge gathered together choſe mē ſende thē vnto wyth mooſt beloued barnabas paule men whyche actu 13 c 14 chaue delyuered theyr lyues name lorde ieſus chriſt haue ſente therfore iudas silas whyche themſelues alſo ſhall wyth wordes ſhewe ſame hath pleaſed holy gooſt v lay nomore charge vpon thā theſe neceſſary poyntes ye abſteyne ſelues zach 9 1 cor 8 10 c thynges offered vp vnto ydols bloude ſtranguled fornicacion kepynge ſelfe whych ye ſhall well fare ye well therfore beynge letten go wente downe antioche multytude beynge gathered delyuered lettre whych whā red reioyced conſolacion iudas silas ſeynge prophetes alſo comforted brother wyth much preachyng ſtabylyſhed whan ben certayne tyme let go peace brother vnto ſente silas thoughte good remayne iudas went alone ieruſalem gala 2 paule barnabas remayned antioche preachynge ſhewynge wyth many worde god certayn dayes ſayd paule vnto barnabas let v returnyge viſite brother thorowe cyties haue preached ye worde lorde barnabas wolde haue taken wt alſo ihon whyche ſurnamed marke paule thence philippi whyche chefe cytie macedonia fre cytie remaynynge cytie certayne dayes vppon day ſabbattes went forthe gate water prayer ſemed ſyttynge ſpake vnto wemen come together certayne woman yf ye haue iudged beleuynge vnto ye lord entre houſe abyde ſhe gene 19 luce 14 24 c compelled v fortuned whyle went vnto prayer certayne dameſell hauynge 1 reg 28 aa ſoythſayenge ſprete mete v whyche beynge ſory beyng turned ſayde vnto ſprete commaunde name ieſus chriſte go forth marc 16 • wente ſame houre hyr lordes ſeynge hope theyr actu 19 • vauntage gone oute 1 teſſa 2 takynge paule silas broughte iudgemente place ruler bryngynge vnto officer ſayde theſe men actu 7 b trouble oure cytie ſeynge iewes ſhewe coſtume whyche lawfull v receaue ſeynge romanes people ranne officer theyr clothes beynge rente cō maunded actu 17 b 2 cor • 11 • beaten wyth roddes whā layed many ſtrypes put thē preſon cōmaundynge keper ſhulde diligently kepe whyche whan receaued ſuche commaundemente put ynner preſon put theyr fete ſtockes actu 4 dand mydnyghte paule silas worſhippynge prayſed god preſon herde ſodenly dyd ther happen great earthquake inſomuch fundacions preſon moued actu 5 c 12 • forthwith dores opened bandes euery one lowſed keper preſon beynge waked ſeynge ye dores ye preſon open ſwearde drawen wolde haue ſlayen hymſelfe ſuppoſynge preſoners haue bene runne awaye paule cryed wt loude voyce ſayeng thyſelfe harme lyght called wente quakynge fell paule silas fete bryngynge forth ſayd actu 2 dsyrs muſt may ſaued ſayde marci 16 b iohā 6 f beleue lorde ieſus thou thy houſe ſhalbe ſaued ſpake worde lorde vnto hym hys houſe takynge ſame houre nyght waſhed theyr ſtrypes continently hys houſe baptyſed whan brought hys houſe ſet table luce 5 19 reioyced wyth hys houſe beleuynge god whan become daye officer ſente ſergeaūtes ſayenge let thoſe men go keper preſon ſhewed theſe wordes vnto paule officer haue ſente ye lowſed therfore ye gettynge henc • go peace paule ſayde vnto haue put v preſon beynge romanes beaten openly vncondemned nowe thruſt v preuely ſo let come thēſelues thruſt v ſergeauntes ſhewed theſe wordes vnto offycers afeared whan herde romanes commynge beſought actu 28 cand ſome beleued ioyned paule silas heythen ſeruyng god great multitude fewe ye chefe wemen iewes hauynge indignacyon takynge thē ſome wycked men commune ſorte company gathered ſet ye cytie vp theſe contrary ſtatutes emperoure iohā 18 c 19 ſayenge another kynge ieſus troubled people ruler cytie hearynge theſe thynges ſufficient anſwer receaued iaſon let thē go forth wyth ye brethrē nyght ſent paule silas awaye berrhea whych whan come entred ye ſynagoge ye iewes wer gētler thā theſſalonica whych dyd receaue worde wyth harty deſyre ioha 5 ſearchynge ſcriptures dayly whether ſo truely many beleued ye heythenyſh wemen men 1 teſſa 2 c whan iewes theſſalonica knowen worde god preached berrhea alſo paule came thyther alſo ſettynge rore troublynge ye multitude dyd brother ſtrayght waye ſende awaye paule ſhulde go vntyll ſee silas timotheus remayned cōueyed paule brought hym vntyll athens commaundemente receaued vnto 1 • ſſa 1 silas timotheus yt hayſtely ſhulde come hym wente theyr waye whan paule taryed athens hys ſprete ſteared wythin ſeynge cytie geuen ydolatry therfore diſputed ye iewes ſynagoge wyth ye religious wyth reſorted daylye vnto hym market place certayne philoſophers epicure ſtoikes ſecte reaſoned wyth hym ſome ſayd wyll thys babler ſaye ſayd ſemeth ſhewer new deuels ſhewed ieſu reſurreccion vnto hym taken led hym areopagus place matter ſpecially cōcernīg lyfe death • e handled areopagus ſayenge maye knowe thys newe doctrine taught thou bryngeſt certayne new thynges eares wyl therfore know theſe thynges wyll al athenian ſtraūgers gaue themſelues nothynge ſaue ether ſay heare ſome newe thynge paule ſtandynge myddes areopagus ſayd ye mē athēs ſe ſuperſticious nearehande thynges goynge ſeynge youre ymages haue founde alſo altare wryttē vnknowen god therfore whych ye worſhippe vnknowen ſhewe pſal 145 actu 14 god made ye worlde thynges therein ſame ſeynge lorde heauen earth dwellleth temple made wyth handes nother worſhippped wt mēs hā de nedynge ony thynge ſeyng geueth al men lyfe breth al thynges hath made one kynde men dwell vpon whole face earth defynynge appoynted ſeaſons border theyr dwellynge ſeke god yf happely maye fele fynde hym thoughe farre euery one v hym lyue moued alſo certayne youre owne • atus poetes haue ſayd alſo hys kynde seynge kynred god oughte thynke godheade lyke vnto golde ſyluer vnto ſtone connynge grauynge inuē cion man rom 2 truely god ouer ſeynge tymes thys ignoraūce luce 24 dhe doth ſhewe vnto men euery one euery repente becauſe hath appoynted daye wherein ſhal iudge paule myddes ſome men beleuynge hym dyd cleue vnto hym amonge whych alſo dyoniſius areopagita woman name damaris wyth xviii chapter thys beynge departed athens came corinthus fyndynge certayn iewe
