alſo elder act 5 c wytneſſe paſſions chriſte whyche alſo partener glorye whyche reueled tyme come actū 20 fede flocke god amonge prouydynge compelled wyllyngly according god nother fylthye lucre ſake wyllyngly ezech 34 luce 22 b nother rulynge lyke lordes ouer ye lot god hartely tit 2 beynge become enſample flocke whā ye chef ye ſhepherdes ſhal appeare ye ſhal receaue 1 cor 9 2 tim 4 b vncorruptible crowne glory lykewyſe ye yonge men obedient vnto elder men yee ſhewe lowlyneſſe euery one another proue 11 iacob 4 god doth reſyſt proud geueth grace vnto ye lowly✚become ye therfor lowly vnder ye mighty hande god maye exalte tyme viſitacion pſal 54 c math 6 c luc 12 ccaſtynge carefulneſſe vpō hym careth ſobre watch iob 1 b ephe 6 b aduerſary deuell goeth aboute roarynge lyon ſekynge whome maye deuoure iaco 4 reſyſt beynge ſtrōge fayth knowynge ſame ſufferynge happen vnto brotherheade whych worlde ye god al grace hath called v vnto hys eternal grace chriſt ieſu ſame ſhall make perfecte confirme ſtaye rom 8 c 1 petri 1 heb 10 haue ſuffred lytle vnto hym glory empyre euer euer amen ⊢ syluanus faythfull brother vnto ſuppoſe haue wrytten brefely prayenge earneſtly requyrynge true grace god whych ye ſtande choſen congregacion babilon ſaluteth marke ſonne rom 16 b 1 cor 16 c 2 cor 13 b grete ech holy kyſſe grace wyth whyche chriſt ieſu amen ¶ ende fyrſte canonical epiſtle peter apoſtle ſeconde canonicall epiſtle peter apoſtle fyrſt chapter simon peter ſeruaūt apoſtle chriſt ieſus vnto haue optayned coequall faythe wyth v ye ryghteouſneſſe oure god ſaueoure ieſus chriſt 1 petri 1 grace vnto peace fulfylled knowlege god chriſt ieſu lord thynges godly power whyche belonge vnto lyfe godlyneſſe geuē vnto v hys knowlege whych hath called v hys owne glorye power whome hath geuen v greate precious promyſes thereby ye become ioh 1 coloſſ 2 • partaker godly nature flyenge corrupcion ye deſyre whych ye worlde ye applyenge care miniſtre youre faythe vertue vertue knowlege 1 cori 8 knowlege abſtinēce abſtinence pacience pacience godlyneſſe godlyneſſe loue brotherheade loue brotherhead charite yf theſe wyth plēteous ſhall make voyde wythout frute ye knowlege lorde ieſus chriſte hath theſe thynges blynde gropynge wyth hande forgettynge clenſynge hys olde ſynnes wherfore brother endeuoure ye ye make ſure callynge choſynge wyth good workes doynge theſe thynges ye ſhall ſynne ony tyme ſo ſhal entraunce euerlaſtynge kyngdome lorde saueoure ieſus chriſt miniſtred vnto plentyfully luce 22 • wherfore ſhall begynne admonyſhe alwaye theſe thynges truely knowynge beynge ſtablyſhed preſent truth reken ryghtfull longe thys 2 corin 5 tabernacle rayſe admonicion ioh 21 • 1 tim 4 beynge ſure layenge downe tabernacle ſhalbe quicke accordynge alſo lorde ieſus chriſt hath ſhewed yee wyll geue diligence ofte yt yt may haue death ye make remembraunce theſe thynges ✚ haue made knowen vnto power foreknowlege oure lorde ieſus chriſt hauyng followed rude fable iohā 1 b • ioh 1 abut beynge become beholder hys greatneſſe receauynge god father honoure glory ſuche voyce frō great glory beyng fallen downe vnto hym math 17 marc 9 luc 9 dthys beloued ſonne whō haue delyte heare hym thys voyce haue herde brought heauen whan wyth hym vpon holy mounte haue ſure worde prophecye vnto whych ye well geuynge hede vnto lyghte • cor 4 b ſhynynge darcke place tyl ye daye ryſe ye morowe ſtarre ryſe harte ⊢knowynge thys fyrſt yt al ye prophecy ſcripture done priuate interpretaciō daniel 9 b zach 7 b 2 tim 3 b prophecy neuer brought man wyl holy men god haue ſpokē beynge inſpyred holy gooſt ii chapter bvt ther haue bē falſe prophetes alſo amonge ye people mat • 4 actū 20 1 tim 4 ther ſhalbe lyeng mayſters amonge whych ſhal brynge ſectes perdiciō deny lord yt hath bought thē bryngynge vpō thēſelues ſwyft perdicion math 8 b many ſhall followe theyr lecheryes whome waye truth ſhalbe blaſphemed couetouſneſſe ſhal vſe marchaū dyſe vnto whome iudgement longe ſence hetherto doth ceaſſe theyr perdicion ſlepeth iob 4 b apoc 20 yf god dyd ſpare angel ſynnynge beynge drawen downe wyth bādes lower partes hell hath delyuered puniſhed kept vnto iudgement geneſ 7 hath ſpared ye originall worlde hath kept noe ryght preacher ryghteouſneſſe bryngyng floude vpon worlde wycked men geneſ 19 • bryngynge cyties sodoma gomorra aſſhes damned wyth ouerthrowynge ſettyng thē enſāple yt ſhuld euel gen 19 • delyuered ryghteous loth beynge oppreſſed wyth iniury lecherous conuerſacion wycked ſyght hearynge ryghteous dwellynge wyth thē vexed ye iuſt ſoule frō daye daye wyth wycked workes 1 cor 10 b lord knoweth drawe ye godly tēptaciō reſerue wycked vnto ye day iudgemēt tormented ſpecyally thoſe ye walke fleſh deſyre vnclēneſſe deſpyſe power bolde pleaſynge thēſelues fear bryng ſectes blaſphemyng iud 1 b angel whyle greater ſtrength power bear agaynſte themſelues curſed iudgemente iere 12 • theſe euen vnreaſonable beaſtes naturally iude • b blaſphemynge thoſe thynges yt knowe vnto ſnare deſtruccion ſhal peryſh theyr owne corrupcion receauynge ye rewarde vnryghteouſneſſe eſtymynge one dayes voluptuouſneſſe pleaſure ſtaynynges ſpottes ouerflowynge pleaſures theyr feaſtes vſynge exceſſe hauynge eye full aduoutrye vnceſſeable ſynne entycynge vnſtable ſoules▪ hauynge harte exercyſed couetouſneſſe chyldrē curſe leauynge ryght waye haue erred hauynge followed waye num 2223 24 balaam boſor whych loued rewarde wickedneſſe nu 31 b hadde tame domme b • aſte reprofe hys foly▪ ſpeakyng wt man voyce forbad prophetes foolyſhneſſe theſe fountaynes wythout water iude 1 c cloudes caried wyth tēpeſtes vnto whome ye myſt darkneſſe reſerued ſpeakynge wyth pryde vanite entyce lechery deſyres fleſh eſcape lytle conuerſaūt erroure promyſynge lyberte whan themſelues ſeruauntes corrupcion iohā 8 c rom 6 b luce 9 f whome ony mā ouercome hys ſeruaūt alſo iohā 8 c rom 6 b luce 9 ffor yf flyeng ye ſtayninges worlde knowlege oure lorde saueoure ieſus chriſt beynge tangled wyth theſame ouercome agayne math 12 c hebre 6 latter endes become worſe vnto fyrſt ben better knowe waye ryghteouſnes thā ye knowlege actu 5 ato turne backwarde holy commaundemente delyuered vnto ye true prouerbe chaūced vnto proue • 6 b eccli 3 • ▪ dogge turned agayne vomite▪ ſowe beynge waſhen wallowynge myre iii chapter beholde thys ſecōde epiſtle wryte vnto dearely beloued whych rayſe youre ſyncere mynde admonicion ye myndefull thoſe thynges haue ſayd namely wordes holy prophetes apoſtles preceptes lorde saueoure knowynge alſo fyrſt al act 20 1 tim 4 2 tim 3 iude 1 c laſt dayes ſhal come mocker deceaueableneſſe walkyng theyr owne deſyres ſayeng ezec 12 2 theſſ 2 wher promyſe hys comynge ſence father ſlepte thynges ſo remayne begynnynge creature thys knowe wyllyngly heauēs fyrſt gen 1 ye earthe beynge water water worde god whyche thynges gen 7 worlde peryſhed water heauen earth ſet vp agayne theſame worde kepte 2 theſſ 1 • fyre vnto daye iudgemente deſtruccion wycked mē let thys one thynge ygnoraunt vnto ye beloued pſal 89 ezech 12 • 1 petr 4 one daye lord thouſāde yeares thouſande yeares one daye lorde doth make longe wyth hys promyſe ſome ſuppoſe rom 2 behaueth hymſelfe paciently becauſe ezech • 8 wyllynge ony peryſh men come agayne repē taūce math 24 • theſſ 5 apoc 3 daye ye lorde ſhall come thefe eſay 51 b pſal 101 hebre 1 b whych heauens ſhall paſſe wyth great ruſh elementes ſhalbe lowſed wyth heate earth workes therein ſhalbe burnte whan al theſe louſed whar maner perſōs ought ye holy conuerſacions godlyneſſes waytynge haiſtynge vnto cōmynge ye lordes day ye ye heauēs burnynge ſhalbe lowſed elemē te heate fyre ſhall fayde eſ •• • 5 c apoc 21 wayte new heauens new earth eſa 66 math 13 • hys promyſes whyche ryghteouſneſſe dwelleth wherfore ye dearly beloued waytynge theſe thynges endeuoure founde vnſpotted vnſtayned vnto hym peace eſtyme longe ſufferynge oure lorde health mooſt beloued brother paule hath wrytten vnto accordynge wyſedome geuen hym euen hys epiſtles alſo ſpeakynge theſe thynges ye ſome thynges harde vnderſtande whych vnlearned vnſtedfaſt peruerte ſcriptures alſo theyr damnacion ye brother therfore knowyng beware lefte beynge drawen awaye ye fall owne ſtedfaſtneſſe growe grace knowlege oure lorde saueoure ieſus chriſte hym glory daye euerlaſtynge amen ¶the ende ſeconde canonical epiſtle peter apoſtle fyrſt cacanonicall epiſtle ihon apoſtle fyrſt chapter whyche frō begynnynge whych haue herd ioh 1 b 2 petri 1 b haue ſene wyth eyen whych haue beholden ioh 20 handes haue hādled ye worde lyfe lyfe manifeſte haue ſene teſtifye ſhew vnto iohā 17 ye lyfe euerlaſtyng whych father appeared vnto v whych haue ſene haue herde ſhewe vnto ye alſo maye haue fellowſhippe wyth v yt oure fellowſhip wt father wyth hys ſonne ieſus chriſt theſe thynges wryt vnto ye may reioyce ioh 16 b 17 b 2 iohā b ioye maye ful ioh 17 b thys tydynges haue herde hym ſhewe vnto god lyghte ther darkeneſſe hym pſal 14 eſay 33 b yf ſay haue fellowſhippe wyth hym walke darkeneſſe lye truth yf walke lyghte alſo lyghte haue fellowſhippe together heb 9 b 1 petri 1 c apoc 1 bloude hys ſonne ieſus chriſte clenſeth v ſynne pro 29 b yf ſaye haue ſynne deceaue oure ſelues truth v 3 reg 8 g 9 io • 13 b prou 28 b eccli 7 c pſal 31 ayf knowlege ſynnes faythfull ryghteous forgeue v oure ſynnes clenſe v wyckedneſſe yf ſaye haue ſynned make hym lyar hys worde v ii chapter ✚ lytle chyldrē theſe thynges wryte vnto ye ſynne althoughe ony man doth ſynne haue hebre 7 aduocate god father ieſus chriſte ryghteous rom 3 c attonemente oure ſynnes oures alſo whole worldes ther knowe loue hym yf kepe hys commaundementes • iohā 4 che ſayeth hym know god doth kepe hys cōmaūdemētes lyare theſame truth kepeth worde truely ſame loue god perfecte ioh 13 thereby know hym ioh 13 b • petri 2 c ſayeth hym abyde hym oughte alſo walke ſo hath walked ⊢mooſt beloued wryte newe cōmaūdemēte vnto olde commaundement whych ye frō ye begynnynge olde commaundement worde whych ye haue herde agayne wryte vnto ioh 13 15 b newe commaundement whyche alſo true darkeneſſes paſt true lyghte doth nowe ſhyne ſayeth lyght hateth hys brother yet darkeneſſe loueth hys brother remayneth lyghte ther offendicle hym hateth brother darkeneſſe walketh darkeneſſe woteth whether doth go darkeneſſes haue blynded hys eyen wryte vnto lytle chyldren luce 24 actu 4 ſynnes forgeuen hys name ſake wryte vnto father becauſe ye haue knowen hym frō begynnyng wryte vnto yongemen ye haue ouercome wycked wryte vnto babe ye haue knowen father wryte vnto father ye haue knowen frō begynnynge wryte vnto yonge men ye ſtronge worde god abydeth ye ouercome wycked loue worlde thynges yt worlde yf ony man loueth worlde loue father hym world cōcupiſcēce ye fleſh deſyre eyen pryde lyfe whych father worlde pſal 89 1 cor 7 eſa 40 worlde paſſeth awaye hys luſt yt doth ioh 6 • 1 teſſ 4 wyl god abydeth foreuer lytle chyldren laſt houre ye haue herde mat 24 ioh 5 antichriſt cōmeth euē ther many become antichriſtes wherby knowe laſt houre went iohā 13 c act 20 v v yf hadde ben v ſhulde verely haue remayned wyth v 1 cor 11 b maye knowen v ye haue heb 1 b anoyntynge hym holy ye knowe thynges haue wrytten vnto knowyng truth knowyng becauſe euery lye ye truth lyar ſaue denyeth ieſus chriſte ſame antichriſt whych denyeth father ſōne ioh 14 euery one yt denyeth ye ſōne hath ye father cōfeſſeth ſōne hath ye father alſo whych ye haue herde frō ye begynnyng doth remayne yf yt remayne whyche ye haue herde begynnynge ye ſhal alſo remayne ye ſōne father ye promyſe yt hath promyſed v namely lyfe euerlaſtynge theſe thynges haue wrytten thē yt deceaue eſa 54 c iohā 6 c 14 c 16 b anoyntynge ye haue receaued hym let remayne ye haue nede yt ony mā teach lyke anoyntyng teacheth thynges ſo true alſo lye hath taughte ſo abyde hym nowe ye lytle chyldren abyde hym whan ſhal cain whych ye euel ſlew hys brother wherfore dyd ſlaye hym becauſe hys workes euell hys brother ryghteous ✚ ioh 15 b maruayle brother yf worlde hate knowe tranſlated frō death lyfe becauſe loue ye toucheth hym knowe god whole worlde ſet myſchefe knowe ye ſōne god come luce 24 dand hath geuē v vnderſtandynge may know true god hys true ſonne thys ſame true god euerlaſtynge lyfe lytle chyldren kepe ymages ¶the ende fyrſte canonical epiſtle ihon apoſtle ſecond canonicall epiſtle ihon apoſtle fyrſt chapter elder ye electe lady hyr chyldrē whome loue truth alſo haue knowē ye truth truthes ſake whych abydeth ſhalbe wyth foreuer grace mercye peace wyth god father chriſt ieſu math 17 ſonne father truth loue▪ reioyced greatly haue founde thy chyldren walkyng truth haue receaued commaundement father nowe beſeke lady wrytynge 1 ioh 2 new commaundemēt vnto frō begynnyng loue one another thys loue walke hys cōmaundementes thys commaundemente ye haue herde ſence begynnynge ye walke hym 1 ioh 2 • 4 many deceauers gone worlde whych cōfeſſe ieſus chriſte come fleſh thys deceauer antichriſt take hede yourſelues ye loſe thynges ye haue wrought ye maye receaue full rewarde euery one goeth backe contynueth ioh 14 c doctrine chriſt hath god continueth doctrine ſame hath father ſōne • teſſ 1 byf ony commeth vnto bryngeth thys doctrine receaue ye houſe nother ſalute hym ſaluteth hym partner hys euell workes beholde haue tolde ye aſhamed lordes daye • ioh b hauynge many thynges wryte vnto wolde wt paper ynke truſt wyth ſpeake mouth mouth ioh 16 c 1 ioha 1 ayour ioye may full chyldrē thyne electe ſyſter ſalute ¶the ende ſeconde canonicall epiſtle ihon apoſtle thyrde canonicall epiſtle ihon apoſtle fyrſte chapter elder vnto mooſt deare gaius whome loue truth dearly beloued thynges wyſh thou walke proſperouſly fare well thy ſoule proſpereth reioyced greatly whan brother dyd come dyd bear wytnes vnto thy truth thou walkeſt truth haue greater grace theſe heare chyldren walke truth dearly beloued heb 13 thou doeſt faythfully ſoeuer thou doeſt vnto brother vnto ſtraungers whych haue borne wytneſſe vnto thy loue ſyght cōgregacion ye whych bryngynge theyr way worthely vnto god thou ſhalt well gone forth hys name ſake 1 cori 9 b 2 cor 11 takynge nothinge heythen ought therfore math 10 cto receaue ſuche maye fellowhelpers truth happely wrytten vnto congregaciō diotrephes whyche loueth beare rule ſame doth receaue v therfore yf ſhall come ſhal admonyſh hym hys workes doth bablynge agaynſt v wt euell wordes though theſe thynges ſufficiente vnto hym nother doth receaue brother thoſe receaue doth forbyd caſt forth congregacion dearly beloued followe euel yt good doth well god yt doth euel ſeyth god vnto demetrius good reporte geuē euery one truth herſelfe yee alſo geue hym good reporte thou knoweſt yt reporte true many thynges wryt vnto 2 ioh b wolde wt ynke penne wryte vnto truſt ſe ſhortly ſhall ſpeake mouth mouth peace vnto frēdes grete grete frendes name ¶the ende thyrd canonicall epiſtle ihon apoſtle canonicall epiſtle iude apoſtle fyrſt chapter ivdas ſeruaunte ieſus chriſte brother iames vnto ſayntes ar beloued god father kepte called chriſt ieſu mercy vnto peace loue fulfylled dearly beloue buſyenge mooſte carefully wryte vnto nedefull vnto wryte vnto youre commune ſaluacion deſyrynge fayth delyuered vnto ſayntes ſtryuen thorow • petri 2 afor ther ſome men preuely entred whych longe ſence wrytten vnto ſuche iudgement wycked chaungyng grace lord ieſus chriſte lechery pſal 13 denyenge ruler lorde ieſus chriſt wyll admonyſh knowynge al ye ieſus ſauynge people ye lāde egipte ſecōdarely num 14 deſtroyed thoſe dyd beleue eſa 14 b iob 4 b apoc 20 angel kepte theyr princely ſtate haue lefte theyr dwellyng hath kepte wyth eternall bandes vnder darkneſſe vnto iudgement great daye gen 19 • sodoma gomorrha cyties thereby goynge whoryng ſtraūge fleſh ſufferynge ye payne euerlaſtynge fyre lyke maner become enſample lykewyſe truely theſe alſo yt ſtayne theyr fleſh deſpyſe gouernaunce ſpeake euel ye maieſty zach 3 whā michaell archangell diſputynge dyd ſtryue aboute body moſes durſt geue iudgemēt agaynſt blaſphemy ſayde god commaunde 2 petri 2 c theſe truely ſpeake euel ſoeuer thynges know whatſoeuer thynges knowe naturally domine beaſtes thoſe corrupte wo vnto gone waye gen 4 cain erroure nu 24 balaam ſpylte wyth rewarde gone gayneſayenge num 16 chore theſe ſpottes feaſtynge theyr meates wythout feare fedyng themſelues 2 petri 2 cloudes wythout water whych caryed aboute wyth wyndes tree gatherynge tyme vnfrutefull twyſe deade pulled vp rootes wawes ragynge ſee fomynge theyr ſhames wandrynge ſtarres vnto whome ye tempeſt darkeneſſe kepte foreuer enoch alſo ſeuenth frō adam prophecyed theſe ſayenge eſaye 5 c apoca 1 beholde lorde come wt hys holy thouſandes geue iudgemente agaynſt euery man rebuke ye wycked theyr workes wyckedneſſe wherewith haue done wyckedly cruell ſpeakynges wycked ſynners haue ſpoken agaynſt god theſe murmurer cōplainers walkynge theyr luſtes theyr mouth ſpeaketh pryde wonderynge men cauſe auauntage ye mooſt beloued myndfull wordes ſpoken afore apoſtles oure lorde ieſus chriſtact 20 1 tim 4 2 tim 3 2 petri 3 ſayd vnto yt ye laſt ſeaſons ſhal come mocker walkynge wyckedneſſes accordynge theyr pleaſures theſe ſeparate themſelues beaſtly hauynge ſprete ye mooſt beloued buyldynge yourſelues vpō mooſt holy fayth▪ prayenge holy gooſt kepe yourſelues loue god waytynge mercy lorde ieſus chriſte lyfe euerlaſtynge truely beynge iudged rebuke ye ſaue ye drawynge ye fyre haue compaſſion vpon ye wyth feare hatynge alſo ſame ſpotted cote whych fleſhly vnto hym able kepe wythout ſynne ſet vnſpotted ſyght glory ioye commynge lorde ieſus chriſte vnto god saueours thorow ieſus chriſt lorde glory maieſty empyre power worlde euer euer amen ¶the ende canonicall epiſtle iude apoſtle apocalypſe reuelacion apoſtle ihon fyrſt chapter reuelacion ieſus chriſte whyche god gaue vnto hym ioh 16 b make manifeſte vnto hys ſeruauntes whych muſt happen ſhortly ✚ ſhewed ſendynge hys angell vnto hys ſeruaunt ihon iohā 19 21 whych dyd beare wytneſſe word god wytneſſe vnto ieſus chriſt euer dyd ſe apoc 22 happy readeth heareth ye wordes thys prophecy kepeth theſe thynges written theſame ye time hāde ihon vnto ſeuen congregacions aſia grace vnto peace frō hym yt come frō ſeuē ſpretes ſyght hys trone ieſus chriſt whych faythfull wytneſſe 1 cori 15 c coloſſ 1 b fyrſt borne deade prynce kynges earth whyche hath loued v hebre 9 b 1 petri 1 c 1 ioh 1 b hath waſhē v frō ſinnes bloud hath made v kingdom preſtes vnto god hys father vnto hym glory empyre euer euer amen ⊢ math 24 c iude c beholde cōmeth wyth cloudes euery eye ſhall ſe hym zach 12 c iohā 19 haue pearſed kynred earthe ſhall bewayle themſelues ouer hym euē ſo amen eſa 44 b apoc 22 c alpha omega begynnynge ende ſayeth lorde god almyghty whyche whych whych come ihon brother partaker tribulacion kyngdome pacience chriſte ieſu ye ile whych called pathmos worde god wytneſſe ieſus chriſt ſpret ſondaye herde greate voyce behynde trompe ſayeng thou ſeyſt wryte boke ſende vnto ſeuen cō gregacions aſia vnto epheſus smyrna pergamus thyatira sardis philadelphia laodicia turned myght ſe voyce ſpake vnto beynge turned ſawe ſeuen golden candelſtickes myddes ſeuen golden candelſtickes one daniel 7 b 10 lyke ſonne man clothed wyth longe garmente reachynge towes gyrded aboute breſt wyth golden gyrdle hys heade heeres whyte whyte woll ſnowe apoc 2 c 19 c hys eyen flame fyre hys fete lyke vnto braſſe burnynge burnynge ouen hys voyce voyce many water hys ryghthāde ſeuen ſtarres apoc 19 c hys mouth wente ſwearde ſharpe ſydes math 17 hys face ſonne ſhyneth hys ſtrength whan hadde ſene hym fell hys fete euen deade layde hys ryghthande vpon ſayenge feare eſai 44 • fyrſt laſt rom • b alyue deade beholde lyuynge euer euer iob 12 b eſaie 2 • apoc • b haue keyes death hell wryte therfore thynges yt thou haſt ſene yt muſt done thys myſtery ſeuē ſtarres whych yu haſt ſene handes ſeuen golden candelſtickes thys ſeuen ſtarres angel ſeuen congregacions ſeuen candelſtickes ſeuen congregacions ii chapter wryte vnto mal • c • b 1 cor 11 b apoc 3 angel ye cōgregacion epheſus theſe thinges ſayeth yt holdeth ye ſeuē ſtarres hys ryghthande whyche walketh myddes ſeuen goldē cā delſtickes knowe thy workes laboure thy pacience thou canſt ſuffre euel men haſt proued ſaye apoſtles haſt foūde lyars haſt pacience haſt ſuffred name ſake haſt faynted haue thynges agaynſt yu haſt left thy fyrſt loue therfore myndeful whence thou arte fallē frō repente fyrſt workes luce 13 yf ſhall come quickly vnto remoue thy candelſticke frō hys place wythoute thou repente thys haſt yu alſo thou hateſt dedes actu 6 nicolaitans whych hate alſo yt hath eare let hym heare ſprete ſaye vnto congregacions vnto hym ouercommeth ſhal geue eat gen 2 b tre lyfe ye paradyſe god vnto angell congregacion smyrna wryte theſe thynges ſayeth eſay 41 fyrſt laſte whyche deade lyueth knowe thy tribulacion thy pouerte thou arte ryche thou arte blaſphemed ſay iewes ſinagoge satanas feare none thoſe thynges thou ſhalte ſuffre beholde deuel ſhall caſt ſome preſon ye maye proued ye ſhall haue tribulacion ten dayes faythfull vntyll death ſhall geue tob 3 2 tim 2 athe crowne lyfe hath eare let hym heare ſprete doth ſaye vnto congregacions ſhall ouercomme ſhall hurte ſeconde death wryte vnto angell congregacion pergamus theſe thynges ſayeth hath hebre 4 c ſharpe two edged ſwearde knowe thou dwelleſt ſeate satanas thou kepeſt name haſte denyed fayth thoſe dayes antipas faythfull wytneſſe whyche ſlayē satanas dwelleth haue fewe thynges agaynſt the▪ becauſe yu haſt holde ye doctrine num 25 31 c balaā whych taught balac put occaſion ſynne ye chyldrē iſrael eat cōmit fornicaciō euē ſo haſt yu alſo thē yt kepe ye doctrine nicolaitans repent thou lykewyſe yf wyll come ſhortly vnto the▪ fyght agaynſt thē wt ſwearde mouth hath eare let hym heare ye ſprete doth ſay vnto ye congregacions vnto hym ouercōmeth ſhal geue hyd mā na ſhal geue hym whyte ſtone ſtone eſaie 6 • iohā 1 new name wrytten whych noman knoweth ſaue receaueth wryte vnto ye angel ye cōgregacion thyatira theſe thinges ſayeth ye ſōne god apoc 1 c 19 cwhich hath eye ye flame fyre hys fete lyke vnto copper knowe thy workes fayth thy loue ſeruice thy paciēce thy laſt workes thā ye fyrſt haue fewe thynges agaynſt becauſe yu ſuffreſt ye womā 3 reg 16 4 reg 9 c ieſabel teach whiche ſayeth prophete myſcary ſeruaūtes vſe fornicacion eate idolofferynges haue geuen reſpyte repente ſhe wyll repente hyr fornicacion beholde caſt bedde vſe whoredome wyth ſhalbe greate tribulacion wythout repente theyr workes ſhall ſlaye hyr chyldren death congregacions ſhal knowe iere 17 b pſal 7 b ſearchynge reynes harte ſhall geue vnto euery one accordynge hys dedes ſaye yt thyatira whoſoeuer haue doctrine yt haue knowen depth satā ſay ſhal laye none charge vpō wtſtādyng kepe yt whych ye haue vntyll come yt ſhal ouercōme ſhal kepe workes vntyl ye endepſal 2 • apoc 19 • ſhal geue hī power ouer ye naciōs ſhal rule wyth yron rodde ſhalbe brokē potter veſſel alſo haue receaued father ſhall geue hym mornynge ſtarre hath eare let hym heare ſprete doth ſaye vnto congregacions iii chapter vnto apoca 2 angel ye cō gregaciō sardis wryte theſe thynges ſayeth yt hath ſeuen ſpretes god ſeuē ſtarres knowe thy workes becauſe yu haſt name thou doeſt lyue thou art dead thou wakyng ſtrengthen ye reſte yt dyenge haue foūde thy workes ful god haue therfore mynde thou haſt receaued herde kepe repent yf thou therfore ſhalt watch ſhall come vnto math 24 1 theſſ 5 2 pet 3 b thefe thou ſhalt knowe houre ſhal come vnto yu haſt name sardis whyche haue defyled theyr garmētes ſhall walke wt whyte garmētes worthy yt ſhal ouercome ſhall ſo clothed wt whyte garmente ſhal put hys name luce 12 boke lyfe ſhall knowlege hys name father hys angel hath eare let hym heare ſprete doth ſaye vnto congregacions vnto angell congregacion philadelphia wryte theſe thynges ſayeth ye holy true whych hath keye dauid whych eſay 22 iob 12 b apoca • openeth nomā ſhutteth ſhutteth noman openeth knowe thy workes beholde haue dore open whych noman ſhute becauſe thou haſt lytle ſtrength haſt kepte worde haſt denyed name beholde ſhall geue ſynagoge ſay thē iewes lye beholde ſhal make thē come worſhippe thy fete ſhall knowe yt haue loued becauſe thou haſt kepte worde pacience wyll alſo kepe houre tēptacion whych ſhall come vpō whole worlde proue ye dweller earth beholde come quyckely holde thou haſt nomā take away thy crown yt ſhal ouer cōme ſhal make pyler tēple god ſhall nomore go forth wyll wryte vpon hym ye name god name ye cytie god newe ieruſalem apoc • 1 awhych come frō heauē fro god new name hath eare let heare ſprete ſayeth vnto congregaciōs vnto angell congregacion laodicia wryte theſe thynges ſayeth amen faythfull true wytneſſe whych begynnyng creature god know thy workes thou arte nother colde whote wolde god thou wereſt ether colde whote becauſe thou arte lukewarme nother whote colde ſhal begyn ſpewe mouth yu ſayeſt rych encreaced haue nede nothyng thou doeſt knowe thou art wretched myſerable poore blynde naked counſell bye golde tryed fyre thou mayeſt become rych thou clothed wt whyte garmentes ye ſhame thy apoca 16 c nakedneſſe appeare anoynte thyne eyē wt eye ſalue yu mayeſt ſe prou 3 b hebre 12 thoſe loue rebuke chaſtiſe feruent therfore repente beholde ſtande dore knocke yf ony mā ſhal heare voyce ſhall open ye dore vnto ſhall entre vnto hym ſhal ſuppe wyth hym ſhall ouercōme ſhall graunt hym luce 22 b ſyt ſeate alſo haue ouercōme haue ſytten wyth father hys ſeate hath eare let hym heare ſprete ſayeth vnto congregacions iiii chapter ✚ thys loked behold dore opē heauē fyrſt voyce yt herde trōpe ſpeakynge wyth ſayenge come vp hether ſhal ſhewe yt thynges muſt happen ſhortely thys forthwyth ſprete beholde ther ſeate ſet heauen one ſyttynge vpon ye ſeate yt ſat lyke vnto iaſper ſtone sardineſtone ther reynebow ye cōpaſſe ſeat like vnto ye ſight smaragde de • 7 b apoc 20 band aboute ſeate foure twenty ſeates vpon ſeates foure twenty elder ſyttynge decked whyte garmētes vpō theyr heades golden crownes trone dyd procede lyghtenynges voyces thonderynges ſeuen burnynge lāpes ye trone ye whych ſeuen ſpretes god ſyght ye ſeate ben glaſſy ſee lyke vnto criſtall myddes ſeate cō paſſe ſeat foure beaſtes full eye behynde ye fyrſt beaſte lyke vnto lion ſeconde lyke vnto calfe thyrde beaſte hauynge face lyke man fourth beaſte lyke vnto egle flyeng ye foure beaſtes euery one ſyxe wynges aboute wythin full eye reſt nyght day ſayenge eſai • 6 holy holy holy lorde god omnipotent whych yt come whā thoſe beaſtes gaue glory honoure bleſſynge vnto hym yt ſytteth vpon ye trone lyuyng euer euer foure twenty elder came forth hym ſytteth vpon trone worſhipped lyuynge euer euer layde downe theyr crownes ye trone ſayng thou arte worthy lord god receaue glory honoure power thou haſte glory power euer euer foure beaſtes ſayd amen foure twenty elder fell vpon theyr face worſhipped lyuyng euer euer vi chapter ſawe lambe opened one ye ſeuē ſeales herde one foure beaſtes ſayenge voyce thōder come ſe ſaw beholde zach 1 b 6 whyte horſe ſat vpon ſame bowe ther crowne geuen vnto hym wente cō querynge ſhulde ouercome whan opened ye ſeconde ſeale herde ſeconde beaſt ſayenge come ſe ther wente another horſe reede ſat vpon geuen hym take waye peace earth ſhulde ſlaye ech ther great ſwearde geuen hym whan opened ye thyrde ſeale herde thyrde beaſte ſayenge come ſe beholde blacke horſe ſat vpon ſame payre balaūces hys hande herde bene voyce ye myddes foure beaſtes ſayenge two pounde weyght wheat one peny thre two pounde weyghtes barlye one peny wyne oyle thou hurte whā opened fourth ſeale herde voyce fourth beaſte ſayenge come ſe beholde pale horſe ſat vpon hys name called death hell followed hym power geuen hym vpon ye foure partes earth kyll wt ſwearde honger death beaſtes earth whan opened fyfte ſeale ſaw vnder altare ſoules thē ſlayne worde god wytneſſe cryed wyth loude voyce ſayeng 4 eſa 15 b danie 12 bhow longe lorde thou holy true doeſt thou iudge doeſt auenge bloude dwell vpon earth vnto euery one geuen whyte garmentes eſay 26 c ſayd vnto thē ſhuld reſt yet lytle whyle vntyll theyr fellow ſeruauntes brother fulfylled whyche kylled alſo ſaw whan opened ſyxte ſeale beholde ther happened great math 27 f earthquake ye ſōne became blacke heery ſacke moone became altogether bloud ſtarres fell downe heauen vpon earth fygge tre caſteth hys vntymely fygges whā ſhakē greate wynde heauē wente awaye boke rolled together euery hyll yles remoued theyr place eſaye 2 c kynges earth prynces captaynes rych ſtronge euery bondman fre man hyd themſelues dēnes rockes hylles ſaye vnto mountaynes rockes oſee 10 b luc 23 c apoca 9 b fall vpon v hyde v ſyghte hym ſytteth vpon trone frō wrath lambe ye great daye theyr wrath come ſhalbe able ryſynge sonne hauynge token lyuynge god cryed loude voyce vnto ye foure angel vnto whome geuen hurte earth ſee ſayenge apoc 9 hurte earth ſee nother tree vntyll ſeale ſeruauntes god theyr foreheades herde nombre ſealed hundreth foure forty thouſande ſealed euery trybe chyldren iſrael trybe iuda twelfe thouſande ſealed trybe ruben twelfe thouſande ſealed trybe gad twelfe thouſande ſealed trybe greate mountayne burnynge caſt ye ſee ye thyrde parte ye ſee became bloude thyrde parte ye creature dyed thoſe lyfe ſee thyrde parte ſhippes peryſhed ye thyrd angell blewe wyth trompet ther fell great burnynge ſtarre frō heauen lyke creſhet fell vpō thyrde parte floodes vpō foūtaynes water name ſtarre called wormewoode thyrde parte ye water became wormewoode many men dyed water became bytter fourth angell dyd blowe wyth trompet ye thyrde parte sōne ſmytten thyrd parte ye moone thyrde parte ſtarres inſomuche thyrde parte darkened thyrde parte daye dyd ſhyne nyghte lykewyſe ſawe herde voyce egle flyenge myddes heauen ſayenge wyth loude voyce wo wo wo vnto dweller earth ye voyces angel blowe wyth trompet ix chapter fyfte angell dydde blowe wyth trompet ſawe ſtarre fallē downe vpon earth ther geuē hym ye keye zacha 9 bthe bottō leſſe pytte opened bottō leſſe pytte ſmoke ye pytte wente vp apoc 14 c 19 ſmoke greate fornace sōne ayer darkened ſmoke pytte ſmoke ye pyt went locuſtes earth power geuen ſcorpiōs ye earth haue power apoc 7 • commaunded ſhulde hurte graſſe earth euery grene thynge euery tre ſaue onely men haue ye token god theyr foreheades ſayd vnto thē ſhuld kyl thē yt ſhuld vexe thē fyue monethes theyr payne payne ſcorpion whan ſtyngeth man thoſe dayes oſee • 0 b apoca 6 • ſhal men ſeke death ſhall fynde ſhall couet dye death ſhall flye lykeneſſes locuſtes lyke vnto horſes prepared vnto battayll vpon theyr heades ben crownes lyke vnto golde theyr face face men heeres heeres wemen theyr teth teth lion habergions yron habergions ſoūde theyr wynges ſounde charrets many horſes runnynge battayle tayles lyke ſcorpions ther ſtynges theyr tayles theyr power hurte men fyue monethes angell ye bottomleſſe pytte kynge ouer whoſe name hebrue abaddon greke apollyon latine hauynge ye name rootynge one wo paſte beholde ther come yet two woe thys ſyxte angell dyd blowe wt tompet herde voyce foure horne golden altare whyche ye eye god ſayenge vnto ſyxte angel yt trōpet louſe foure angel yt boūde great floude euphrates foure angel louſed ready houre daye moneth yeare ſhuld kyll thyrde parte mē nombre horſemen twenty tymes ten thouſāde herde theyr nombre thus ſawe horſes viſion ſat vpō thē fyre habergions yelowe brymſtony horſes heades heades lyon theyr mouth come forth fyre ſmoke brymſtone theſe thre plage thyrde parte men ſlayne namely fyre ſmoke brymſtone whych dyd come forth theyr mouth power ye horſes theyr mouth theyr tayles theyr tayles lyke ſerpentes hauynge heades wyth ſame hurte ye reſt mē kylled wyth theſe plage nother repented workes theyr handes ſhulde worſhip deuels golden ymages ſyluer braſſe ſtone woode whych nother heare ſe walke apoca 22 c haue repented theyr manſlaughter theyr wytchcraftes theyr fornicacion theyr theftes x chapter ſaw another mighty angel cōmyng downe frō heauē clothed wt cloude raynebow vpon hys heade hys face ye sōne hys fete pyler fyre hys hande lytle boke opē ſet hys ryght foote vpō ye ſee lefte vpon earth cryed wyth loude voyce whan lyon roareth whā cryed ſeuē thōders ſpake theyr voyces whan ye ſeuē thonders ſpotheyr voyces wryte herde voyce frō heauen ſayeng vnto seale vp thynges yt ſeuen thōders haue ſpokē wryte thē daniel 12 b angel whome ſawe ſtandyng vpō ſee vpon ye lande lyfte vp hys hāde towarde heauen▪ dyd ſweare ye lyuynge euer euer whych dyd create heauē thynges therein earth thynges yt ſee thynges yt therin ther ſhalbe nomore tyme ye dayes voyce ſeuenth angell whā trōpet ſhal begyn blow myſtery god ſhalbe fyniſhed hath preached hys ſeruauntes ye prophetes herde voice frō heauen ſpeakyng agayne wt ſayenge go take boke open hande angel ſtā dynge vpō ſee vpon ye earth wente vnto angell ſayenge vnto hym ſhulde geue boke ſayd vnto ezech 3 4 eſ • 14 • take boke eate vp ſhall make thy belly become bytter thy mouth ſhalbe ſwete hony toke boke angel hande dyd eate vp ſwete mouth hony whan eatē vp belly become bytter ſayde vnto thou muſt prophecy agayne vnto heythen people tunges many kynges xi chapter ther geuen rede lyke vnto rodde ſayde vnto ezech 40414243 ryſe meete tē ple god altare thē worſhip ye quere yt temple caſt meete geuen vnto heythen holy cytie ſhal tread vnder foot two fortye monethes ſhall geue vnto two wytneſſes ſhall prophecy thouſande two hundreth thre ſcore dayes clothed ſackes zach 4 theſe two olyue tree two ſhynynge candelſtickes ſtandynge ye preſence god ye earth yf ony mā wyl hurte thē fyre ſhall go theyr mouth ſhal cōſume theyr enemyes yf ony mā wyl hurt thē ſo muſt kylled theſe haue power ſhut heauen rayne ye tyme theyr prophecy haue power ouer water turne bloude ſmyte earth wyth euery plage ofte wyll dan 7 apoc 13 whan ſhall haue fynyſhed theyr teſtimony beaſte dyd come vp bottomleſſe pit ſhal make warre agaynſte ſhall ouercome ſhall kyll theyr bodyes ſhall lye ſtretes greate cytie whyche ſpiritually called sodoma egypte theyr lord alſo crucifyed ſome ye tribe people tūges heythē ſhal ſe theyr bodyes thre dayes half ſhal ſuffre theyr bodyes layde graues dweller vpō earth ſhal reioyce ouer thē glad ſhal ſende preſētes ech becauſe theſe two prophetes vexed thē dwelte vpon earth danie 11 b thre dayes halfe dyd ye ſprete lyfe god entre ſtode vpō theyr fete • danie 11 f great feare fell vpon dyd ſe thē herde great voyce heauen ſayenge vnto come vp hether wente vp heauen cloude theyr enemyes ſawe houre ther happened great earthquake thyrde parte cytie fell earthquake ſlayne ye name men ſeuen thouſande ye remnaunte feared gaue prayſe vnto god heauē ſeconde wo paſte beholde thyrde wo ſhall come ſhortely ſeuenth angel dyd blowe wt ye trō pet ther happened great voyces heauē ſayenge kyngdō thys worlde become oure lordes hys chriſtes ſhall raygne euer euer amen foure twentye elder ſyt ſyght god theyr ſeates fell vpon theyr face worſhipped god ſayenge thanke oure lorde god almyghty whych arte wereſt whych arte come thou haſt receaued thy great might haſte raygned heythē angry thy wrath come tyme dead iudged geue rewarde vnto thy ſeruaū te ye prophetes vnto ye ſayntes thē ye drede thy name great ſmal roote thē yt haue corrupped ye earth ye tēple god opened heauē arke hys teſtamēt ſene tēple ther happened lyghtenynges voyces thō drynges earthquake great hayle xii chapter ther appeared great tokē heauen womā clothed wt sōne moone vnder hyr fete hyr head crowne twelfe ſtarres wt chylde cryed trauaylynge payned yt ſhe may brynge forth ther ſene another token heauē ▪ beholde greate reede draggō hauyng ſeuē heades ten horne vpon hys heades ſeuen crownes wt tayle drue ye thyrde parte ſtarres heauē caſte thē earth ye draggō ſtode womā ſhulde brynge forth yt whan ſhe brought forth myght deuoure hyr chylde ſhe brought forth māchylde rule ye heythē wt rod yron hyr ſonne takē vp vnto god vnto hys trone apoc 22 c womā fled ye wylderneſſe ſhe place prepared god yt may fede thouſād two hū dreth thre ſcore dayes ther happened great battayll heauē dan •• • michael hys angel fought draggon draggon fought hys angel preuayled nother theyr place founde ony heauē eſaie 14 b luce 10 b theſame great draggon caſt ye old ſerpent whych called deuel satanas whyche deceaueth whole worlde caſte earth hys angel ſente wyth hym herde great voyce heauen ſayenge ſaluaciō ſtrēgth ye kingdome become god ye power hys chriſtes accuſer brother whych accuſed nyght daye ye preſēce god throwē downe haue ouercōme hym becauſe bloud ye lambe becauſe worde hys wytneſſe haue loued theyr lyues vntyl death reioyce therfore ye heauens ye dwell wo vnto earth ſet deuell come downe vnto hauynge great wrath beynge ſure hath lytle tyme draggon ſawe caſte downe earth perſued woman broughte forth manchylde vnto ye woman geuen two greate wynges great egle apoca 11 c ſhe ſhulde flye ye deſerte hyr place wher ſhe noryſhed daniel 7 tyme tymes halfe tyme ye ſyghte ſerpente ſerpent caſt water hys mouth ye woman lyke ryuer myght make drawen ryuer earth dyd helpe woman earth opened hyr mouth ſwalowed vp ye ryuer whych ye draggon caſt hys mouth draggō wroth wt woman wēte make battayll wt reſidue hyr ſede kepe ye cōmaundementes god haue wytneſſe ieſus chriſte ſtode vpon ſonde ſee xiii chapter ſawe beaſt ryſyng apoca 17 cout ſee hauyng ſeuen heades ten horne vpō horne ten crownes vpon heades name blaſphemy daniel 7 beaſte dyd ſe lyke vnto cat ye moū tayne hys fete lyke fete beer hys mouth mouth lyon draggō gaue hym hys vertue great power ſawe one hys heades ſlayē death ſtroke hys death healed earth wondered ye beaſte worſhipped ye draggon gaue power vnto beaſt worſhipped beaſte ſayenge lyke vnto beaſte ſhalbe able ſtryue wyth hym hym geuen mouth ſpeakynge greate thynges blaſphemyes power geuen vnto hym two forty monethes opened mouth blaſphemyes vnto god ſhulde ſpeake euell hys name tabernacle dwell heauen apoc 11 geuen hym make battayll wt ſayntes ouercome power geuen hym vpō euery kynred people tūge nacion daniel 11 f dwelt vpō earth worſhipped theſame whoſe name wrytten boke lyfe lambe whych kylled begynnynge worlde hath eare let hym heare geneſ 9 math 26 • ſhall leade captiuite goeth captiuite yt ſhall ſlaye wyth ſwearde muſte ſlayne wyth ſwearde apoc 14 c pacience fayth ſayntes ſawe another beaſte goyng vp earth two horne lyke ye lābes ſpake lyke ye draggon dyd al ye power ye fyrſte beaſte hys fyght cauſed earth dwelt ſame worſhippe fyrſt beaſte whoſe wounde death healed dyd great token inſomuche cauſed fyre alſo come downe frō heauen earth ſyght men myſcaryed dweller vpon earth reaſon tokēs yt geuen hym ſyghte beaſte ſayenge vnto dwel earth make ymage vnto beaſte whych hath ye woūde ſwearde dyd lyue geuen hym yt ſhulde geue ſprete vnto ymage beaſte ymage beaſte ſpeake ſhall make whoſoeuer ſhall worſhippe ymage beaſte maye ſlayne ſhall cauſe ſmall great rych poore fre bōde haue marke theyr ryght hande theyr foreheades man myghte bye ſell ſaue haue marke name ye beaſte nombre hys name wyſedome hath vnderſtandynge let hym count nombre beaſte hys nombre nō bre mā hys nombre ſyxe hundreth thre ſcore ſyxe xiiii chapter ✚ ſawe beholde lambe ſtode vpon ye moūte sion wyth hym▪ hundreth foure forty thouſande hauynge hys name name hys father wrytten theyr foreheades herde voyce heauen lyke ſoūde many water voyce greate thonder voyce herd lyke many harper playenge theyr harpes dyd ſynge ben new ſonge ſeate foure beaſtes elder nomā could learne ſonge ſaue thoſe hundreth foure forty thouſāde bought earth theſe defyled wyth wemen virgin theſe followe lambe ſo euer doth go 1 cori 6 c apoc 5 b theſe boughte men fyrſt frutes vnto god lambe theyr mouth lye foūde wythout ſpot ye trone god ⊢ ſawe another angell flyenge thorowe myddes heauen hauyng euerlaſtynge goſpel yt myght preach vnto ſyt vpon earth vpon euery nacion kynred tunge people ſayenge wt loude voyce feare lord geue hym honoure houre hys iudgement come worſhippe hym pſal 145 act 14 c hath made heauen earth ſee fountaynes water another angell dyd followe hym ſayenge eſa 21 b iere 51 b apoca 1 • fallen ſhe fallen greate babilon whyche hath made nacions drynke wyne wrath hyr fornicacion thyrde angell followed ſayenge wyth loude voyce yf ony man ſhall worſhippe beaſt hys ymage ſhall receaue marke hys foreheade hys hande theſame ſhall alſo drynke wyne wrathe god whych mengled wt pure wyne cuppe wrath ſhalbe tormented wyth fyre brymſtone ſyght ye holy angel ſyght ye lambe apoc 9 19 aand ſmoke theyr tormentes ſhal go vp euermore nother haue reſt nyght day whych haue worſhipped beaſte ymage whoſoeuer ſhall receaue marke hys name apoc 13 • pacience ſaintes whych kepe commaundemētes god fayth ieſus herde voyce heauē ſayeng vnto wryte bleſſed deade dye ye lorde hence forth nowe ſayeth ſprete reſt frō theyr laboures theyr workes follow loked beholde whyt cloude vpon cloude one ſyttynge lyke vnto ſonne man hauyng heade goldē crowne ſharpe ſyckle hys hande another angel wente temple cryeng wyth loude voyce hym ſat vpon cloude ioel 3 b math 1 • put thy ſycle reape becauſe houre come reaped harueſte earthe waxen rype yt ſat cloude put hys ſyckle earth dyd reape ther wente another angell temple whych heauen alſo ſharp ſyckle another angell went altare power ouer fyre cryed wyth loude voice vnto hym ſharpe ſyckle ſayenge put thy ſharpe ſyckle gather cluſters vyneyarde earth hys grape rype ye angel thruſt hys ſharpe ſyckle earth cut downe ye vyne yarde earth caſt great wynefat wrath god wynefat trodden wythout cytie bloude came wynefat vntyll horſebrydles ſpace thouſāde ſyxe hundreth furlonges xv chapter ſawe another greate maruaylous token heauen seuen angel hauynge ſeuen laſte plage danie 11 • thē wrath god fulfylled ſawe glaſſy ſee myngled fyre ouercōme beaſte hys ymage nombre name ſtandynge vpon glaſſye ſee hauynge harpes god ſyngyng new ſonge moſes ſeruaūt god ſonge lambe ſayenge great wonderfull thy workes lorde god almyghty iuſt true thy wayes thou kynge euerlaſtyng tymes iere 10 ſhall feare lorde ſhall magnifye thy name thou art holy gentyles ſhal come worſhippe thy ſyghte thy iudgementes manifeſt theſe thynges ſawe beholde ye tabernacle wytneſſe heauen open ſeuen angel wente tēple hauinge ſeuē plage clothed wyth cleane bryght lynnen beynge gyrded wyth golden gyrdles aboute breſtes one foure beaſtes gaue vnto ſeuē angel ſeuē goldē vial full ye wrath god lyuinge euer euer ezec 44 ye tēple god fylled wt ſmoke maieſtye god hys power nomā coulde entre tēple vntyll ye plage ſeuen angel fulfylled xvi chapter herde great voyce tēple ſayeng vnto ye ſeuē angel go poure forth ye ſeuē vial wrath god vpō ye earth fyrſt angel went poured hys vyal vpon ye earth ther happened noyſome mooſt greuous botch men whych ye beaſtes marke vpon thē dyd worſhip beaſt hys ymage ye ſecōde angel poured hys vyal vpon ſee became bloude one yt deade euery lyuynge ſoule dyd dye ſee thyrde angell dyd poure hys vyall vpon ryuers vpon ye foūtaynes water became bloude herde angell water ſayeng thou arte righteous lord art wereſt yu holy whyche haſte iudged thys becauſe haue ſhed ye bloud thy ſaltes prophetes yu haſt geuen thē bloude drynke worthy herde another angel ſayeng yee lord god almyghty thy iudgemētes true ryghteous fourth angell poured vyall agaynſte sonne geuen hym vexe men wyth heate fyre men dyd rage greate heate blaſphemed name god hauyng power ouer theſe plage nother dyd repente ſhulde geue hym prayſe ye fyfte angell poured hys vyal vppon beaſtes ſeate hys kyngdome became darke dyd eate theyr tunges payne dyd blaſpheme god heauen theyr paynes woūdes dyd repente theyr workes ſyxte angell powred hys vyall vpon ye great floude euphrates dryed hys water ye waye myght ready vnto kynges ryſynge sonne ſawe thre vncleane ſpretes go oute mouth draggon mouth beaſte mouth falſe prophet lyke frogges ſpretes deuels doynge token go forth vnto kynges whole earth gather thē battayll vnto great daye ye almyghty god mat 24 luce 12 e 1 theſſ 5 2 pet 3 b beholde come thefe happy watcheth kepeth hys garmētes apoc 3 dleſt go naked ſe fylthyneſſe ſhal gather place hebrue called armageddō ſeuenth angell poured oute hys vyall agaynſte ayre ther wente great voyce temple ſeate ſayenge done ther happened lyghtenynges voyces thonderynges ther happened greate earthquake ſuche neuer ſence mē vpō earth ſuch earthquake ſo great ye great cytie became thre partes cyties nacions fel downe great babilon came remembraunce god geue cuppe wyne fearceneſſe hys wrath euery ile dyd flye mountaynes founde great hayle lyke talēt came downe heauen vpon men men blaſphemed god becauſe plage hayle became exceadynge great xvii chapter one ſeuē angel ſeuen vyales came vnto ſpake wyth me▪ ſayenge come wyll ſhewe th • y• dānacion great whore whych ſytteth vpon many water wyth whyche kynges earth haue cōmytted fornicacion dyd dwell vpon earth become dronke wyne hyr whoredome toke ſprete deſerte ſawe woman ſyttynge vpō roſe coloured beaſt ful name blaſphemy hauynge ſeuē heades ten horne womā clothed wyth purper ſcarlet gylt golde precious ſtone pearles hauynge goldē cuppe hyr hande full abominaciō vnclenneſſe hyr fornicacion hyr forehead name writtē myſtery great babilō ye mother fornicacions abhominaciōs earth ſawe woman dronke bloude ſayntes bloude martyres ieſus whan ſawe maruayled wyth great wonder angell ſayd vnto wherfore maruayleſt thou ſhall tell myſtery woman beaſt beareth hath ſeuē heades ten horne beaſt thou haſt ſene ſhal come bottomleſſe pytte ſhall go deſtruccion dweller vpō earth ſhall wonder luce 10 b pilip 4 apoc 13 b whoſe name wrytten boke lyfe conſtitucion worlde ſeynge beaſt meanynge hath wyſedome ſeuen heades ſeuen moūtaynes vpon ye whych woman ſytteth ther ſeuen kynges fyue fallen one yet come whan ſhall come muſte abyde lytle ſeaſon beaſt whyche ſhe alſo eyght ſeuē goeth deſtruccion dan 7 b apoc 13 ten horne thou haſt ſene ten kynges haue yet receaued kyngdom ſhal receaue power one houre kynges beaſte theſe haue one counſell ſhall delyuer theyr power ſtrength vnto ye beaſte theſe ſhall fyght ye lambe lambe ſhal ouercōme 1 tim 6 c apoc 19 c lorde lordes kynge kinges wyth hym called choſen faythfull ſayd vnto eſaie 8 bthe water thou haſte ſene whore ſytteth people nacions tūges ten horne thou haſte ſen • beaſte ſhall hate whore ſhall make deſolate naked ſhall eate hyr fleſh ſhall burne wyth fyre god hath geuen theyr harte pleaſeth hym yt geue hys kyngdome vnto beaſte vntyll ye wordes god fulfylled woman thou haſt ſene great cytie hath rule ouer kyngges earth xviii chapter theſe thinges ſaw another angel cōmynge downe frō heauē hauyng great power ye earth lyghtened hys glory cryed wyth ſtrength ſayenge eſaie • 1 b iere 51 b apoc 14 b fallen ſhe fallen greate babilon become ye dwellyng deuels holde euery vncleane ſprete holde euery vncleane hatefull byrde wyne wrath hyr fornicaciō haue heythen dronke ye kynges earth haue vſed fornicaciō wyth marchauntes earth become rych ye power hyr pleaſures herde another voyce frō heauen ſayenge gene 19 c 2 corin 6 c go ye people ye partaker hyr ſynnes ye receaue hyr plage hyr ſynnes come vntyll heauen lorde hath remēbred hyr wyckedneſſe geue vnto ſhe alſo hath geuē vnto geue twofolde accordynge hyr workes cup ſhe dyd myxe vnto myxe vnto • uble much ſhe hath glorifyed herſelfe hath vſed pleaſures ſo much payne ſorow geue becauſe ſhe ſayeth hyr harte • ie 47 ſyt beynge quene wedow ſhall ſe ſorowe dani 8 2 theſſ 2 b therfore ſhall hyr plage come one daye death ſorowe honger apoc 17 dand wyth fyre ſhall ſhe burnte ſtronge god whyche ſhall iudge kinges ye apoc 14 b babilon ſtronge cytie one houre thy iudgemente come ye marchaūtes ye earth ſhall wepe wayle ouer noman ſhall bye theyr ware ony ware golde ſyluer precious ſtone pearle fyne lynnen purple ſylke ſcarlet al thynen woode veſſels yuory al veſſels precious ſtone braſſe yron marble cynamon roſe iericho odoure ſalue frankeinſence wyne oyle fyne flore wheate cattell ſhepe horſes charrettes bought ſeruauntes ſoules men appels thy ſoules luſt departed ye well fed coſtly thynges peryſhed frō marchauntes theſe thinges ſhal fynde thē nomore become ryche ſhall ſtande afarre becauſe feare hyr tormentes wepyng waylynge ſayenge iere 5 • b wo wo great cytie whych clothed wyth fyne lynnen purple ſcarlet gylte wyth golde precious ſtone pearles one houre ſo greate ryches come nought euery ſhip gouernoure al ſayle ſee ſhipmen worke ſee dyd ſtande afarre cryed ſeynge place hyr burnyng ſayenge cytie lyke vnto thys great cytie caſt duſt vpon theyr heades cryed wepynge waylynge ſayenge wo wo greate cytie whych become rych ſhippes hir ware ſee one houre ſhe made deſolate reioyce ouer thou heauen ye holy apoſtles prophetes god hathe iudged youre iudgemente ſtronge angell toke vp ſtone great mylſtone caſte ſee ſayenge wyth ſuch violence ſhall iere 5 • • greate cytie babilon throwen ſhall nomore foūde ye voyce harper ye muſiciās pypers trōpet ſhall nomore herde euery crafteſmā euery craft ſhall nomore foūde ſounde myll ſhal nomore herde lyght ye burning light ſhal nomore ſhyne iere 16 •• voyce brydgrome bryde ſhal nomore herde ye thy marchaūtes prīces ye earth al nacions power vnto god hys iudgementes true ryghteous hath iudged ye great whore whych hath corrupte earth wt hir whoredome hath auenged bloude hys ſeruauntes hyr handes ſaid agayne alleluya apoca 9 •• 14 c hir ſmoke wente vp euer euer foure twenty elder foure beaſtes fell downe worſhipped god ſyttyng vpon trone ſayenge amen alleluya ther wente voyce trone ſayenge prayſe ye god hys ſayntes ye feare hym ſmall greate herde voyce great multitude ye ſoūde many water ye voyce great thonders ſayenge alleluya oure lorde god almyghtye hath raygned let v glad reioyce let v geue prayſe vnto hym ſpouſales lābe come hys wyfe hath made herſelfe ready geuē vnto ſhe decke herſelf bryght fyne lynnen whyte fyne lynnen ryghteouſneſſes ſayntes ſaid vnto wryte math 22 luce 14 bleſſed yt called ſupper lābes pure apoca 1 • hys mouth doth procede ſwearde ſharpe ſydes wyth ſame pſal 2 b maye ſmyte heythen ſhall rule wyth rodde yron treadeth wynefat fearceneſſe wyne wrath almyghty god garment thygh hath name worde god dyd worſhippe ye beaſt hys ymage nother dyd receaue hys marke theyr foreheades hā de haue lyued raygned wyth chriſt thouſande yeares ye reſt deade dyd lyue vntyll thouſande yeares fulfylled thys fyrſt reſurreccion bleſſed holy yt hath parte ye fyrſte reſurreccion theſe hath ye ſeconde death power ſhalbe preſtes god chriſt ſhall raygne thouſande yeares hym whan thouſand yeares ſhall fulfylled satanas ſhalbe let louſe hys preſon ſhal go oute deceaue nacions yt vpon foure corner lande ezech • 8 39 gog magog ſhal gather thē battayll whoſe nōbre ye ſande ye ſee came vpō bredth earth cōpaſſed tentes ye ſayntes beloued cytie ther came downe fyre frō god oute ye heauen conſumed daniel 7 b apoca 19 math· 25 deuel yt deceaued thē caſt poole fyre brymſtone beaſt prophete ſhalbe tormented daye nyght euer euer ſawe great bryght trone one ſyttynge vpon whoſe ſyghte heauen earth dyd flye ther place founde vnto daniel 12 aand ſawe deade great ſmal ſtandynge ſyght trone accordynge theyr workes hell death caſt poole fyre thys ſeconde death founde wrytten apoc 13 b boke lyfe caſte poole fyre xxi chapter ſawe eſaie 65 c 2 petr 3 b new heauē newe earth fyrſt heauen gate south thre gate weſte thre gate wall cytie hauynge twelfe fūdamētes thē twelfe name twelfe apoſtles ye lābe zach 2 ſpake wt goldē meaſure rede myght meaſure cytie hyr gate wall cytie ſet ſquare hyr length much ye bredth dyd meete cytie golden rede twelfe thouſande furlonges hyr length bredth heyght equall meaſured wall therof hundreth foure forty cubytes meaſure man whych angel buyldynge hys wall iaſper ſtone cytie ſelfe pure golde lyke vnto cleane glaſſe foundacions wall ye cytie garniſhed wt euery preous ſtone fyrſt foūdaciō iaſpar ſeconde saphire thyrd calcedony ye fourth smaragde fyfte sardonix ſyxt sardius ſeuēth chriſolitus eyght beral nynth topaſe tenth chriſopraſus ye eleuenth hyacinth ye twelft amethiſte ye twelfe gate twelfe pearles ſeuerally euery gate one pearle ſtrete ye cytie pure gold lyke thorow ſhynyng glaſſe ſawe temple lorde god omnipent temple lambe cytie nedeth sonne moone may ſhyne therin bryghtneſſe god ſhal lyghten lambe lyght heythen ſhall walke hys lyght kynges earth ſhall brynge theyr glorye honoure ſame eſay 60 b hyr gate ſhall ſhut daye ther ſhal nyghte ſhall brynge ye glory honoure heythen ſame ther ſhal entre therin ony defyled thynge workynge abominaciō makyng lye ſaue yt wrytē ye boke lyfe ye lābe xxii chapter ſhewed zacha 13 14 b ryuer ye lyuyng water ſhynyng criſtal cōmyng frō ſeate god lābe ye myddes hys ſtrete ether ſyde ryuer tre lyfe bryngyng forth twelfe frutes geuynge hys frute euery moneth leaues ye tre health heithē ther ſhalbe nomore curſe ſeate god lābe ſhalbe therin hys ſeruaū te ſhall ſerue hym ſhall beholde hys vyſage hys name ſhalbe theyr foreheades ther ſhalbe nomore nyght ſhall haue nede lyght ye burnyng lyght light sōne ye lorde god ſhal lyghtē thē ſhall raygne euer euer ſayd vnto theſe wordes mooſt faythfull true lorde god ye ſpretes ye prophetes ſent hys angell ſhewe vnto hys ſeruaūtes thynges yt muſt done quyckely beholde come quyckely happy kepeth ye ſayenges prophecy boke ihon haue herde ſene theſe thynges herde ſene fell downe yt myghte worſhippe fete angell whyche dyd ſhewe theſe thynges ſayd vnto se yu thy fellowſeruaunt thy brethrē thē prophetes thē yt kepe wordes prophecye thys boke worſhippe god ſayeth vnto seale ye wordes prophecy thys boke ye tyme hāde yt hurteth let hym hurte ſtyll yt fythyneſſes let hym fylthy ſtyll yt ryghteous let hym righteous yt holy let hallowed behold come quickely rewarde wyth geue vnto euery man accordyng hys workes alpha omega fyrſt laſte begynnynge ende bleſſed yt waſh theyr garmētes bloude ye lambe theyr power may ye tre lyfe yt maye go ye cytie thorow gate wythout dogges ſorcerers vncleane perſōs murthurers idolatrers euery one yt loueth maketh leſynge ieſus haue ſente myne angell teſtifye theſe thynges ye cōgregacions roote kynred dauid ſhynynge mornynge ſtarre ſprete brydgrome ſay come yt heareth let ſay come yt doth thyrſt let hym come wyll let hym take ye water lyfe frely teſtifye vnto euery one hearynge ye wordes thys prophecy yf ony ſhall adde theſe god ſhall adde vpon hym plage wrytten thys boke yf ony mā diminiſh ye wordes boke prophecy god ſhal take awaye hys parte boke lyfe holy cytie thoſe thynges yt wrytten thys boke beareth wytneſſe theſe thynges ſayeth yee come quickly come lorde ieſu grace lorde ieſus chriſte wyth amen ¶the ende apocalipſe reuelacion ihon apoſtle ¶the ende new teſtament ¶a table finde epiſtles goſpels vſually red church salyſbury vſe wherof fyrſt lyne epiſtle goſpell whoſe begynnynge thou ſhalte fynde boke marked wyth croſſe ✚ ende wyth halfe croſſe ⊢ conteyned wythin letter namely b c c ¶on fyrſt ſondaye aduent rom xiii b knowynge thys mat xxi whan drue nye wedniſdaye iaco v b pacient therfore brethrē mar begynnyng goſ frydaye eſay li herken vnto math iii came ieſus ¶on ſeconde ſonday aduent rom xv thynges ſoeuer luce xxi c ther ſhalbe token wedniſdaye zacha viii thus ſayeth lorde math xi b verely ſaye vnto frydaye eſay lxii b wyll ſet watchman ioh b ihon beareth wytneſſe ¶on iii ſondaye aduent cor iiii let man ſo eſtyme v math xi whan ihon herde wedniſdaye eſay ii thys worde luce b ſyxte moneth frydaye eſay xi ther ſhall come rodde luce mary ryſynge thoſe ¶on fourth ſondaye aduent phili iiii reioyce lord ioh b thys recorde wedniſdaye ioel ii e iii c glad luce vii b thys ſaynge hym frydaye zacha ii b glad reioyce mar viii b take hede beware chriſtmaſſe euen rom paule ſeruaunt math c truely generacion ¶in chriſtmaſſe nyght ye maſſe tit ii b grace god luce ii befell thoſe ¶at ſeconde maſſe tit iii whan kyndneſſe luce ii c ſhepherdes ſpake ¶at thyrde maſſe hebr god ſpeakynge tymes paſt ioh begynnynge ſaynt steuens daye actu vi b steuen full fayth mat xxiii e therfore ſaye vnto ihon euangeliſtes day ecclī xv feareth god ioh xxi followe peter beynge chyldermaſſe daye apo xiiii ſawe beholde math ii c angell lorde ¶on ſondaye chriſtmaſſe gal iiii ſaye longe luce ii e father mother ¶on newyeares daye tit ii b grace god luce ii c whan eyght dayes twelfte euen tit ii b grace god math ii whan herode deade twelfte daye eſay lx get vp tymes math ii whan ieſus therfore ¶on fyrſt ſonday xii day eſay xiii lorde thanke ioh next daye agayne ſtode ¶on ii ſonday xii daye rom xii beſeke therfore brethrē luce ii f whan twelfe ¶on iii ſondaye xii day rom xii lyke haue many ioh ii vpon thyrde daye ¶on iiii ſondaye xii daye rom xii c wyſe mat viii whan ieſus come ¶on v ſondaye xii daye rom xiii b owe noman ought ſaue mat viii c whan wente ¶on vi ſondaye xii daye colo iii b put ye therfore mat xiii kyngdome heauēs ¶on septuageſima ſondaye cor ix knowe ye math xx kyngdome heauens ¶on sexageſima ſondaye ii cor xi c ye ſuffre fooles gladly luce viii whan much people came ¶on quinquageſima ſondaye cor xiii ye ſhall ſpeake luce xviii ieſus toke aſhwedniſdaye iohel ii c therfore ſayeth math vi b whan ye taſte become frydaye eſa lviii therfore cry • math v e ye haue herde ¶on fyrſt ſondaye lent ii cor vi helpynge exhorte math iiii ieſus led wedniſdaye e • od xxiiii c iii reg xix math xii anſwered hym cer frydaye ezec xviii c thus ſayeth lord ioh v ther ¶on ſeconde ſondaye lent teſſ iiii farthermore therfore bre mat xv c ieſus beynge depar wedniſdaye heſt xiii mardocheus thought math xx b ieſus goynge • p frydaye gen xxxvii ioſeph ſayd vnto bre math xxi heare another parable ¶on iii ſondaye lent ephe v ye therfore folio luce xi b caſtynge wedniſdaye exo xx b honoure thy father math xv came vnto hym frydaye num xx congregacion ioh iiii came therfore cytie ¶on fourth ſondaye lent gal iiii c ther wrytten ioh vi whan ieſus lyft vp hys wedniſdaye eſay c eze xxxvi ioh ix ieſus▪ goynge frydaye iii reg xvii c theſe actes ioh xi ther one ſycke called ¶on v ſondaye lent heb ix b chriſt commynge ioh viii rebuke wedniſdaye leui xix lord talked ioh x c dedicacion frydaye iere xvii c lorde al ioh xi • gathered hygh ¶on palme ſondaye phi ii let mynde math xxvi ye know two wedniſdaye eſay liii lorde geueth luce xxii feaſt daye ſwete good frydaye exod xii lorde ſayd vnto ioh xviii whan ieſus ſpoken eaſter euen col iii yf ye therfore ryſen mat xxviii vpon euenynge ¶on eaſterdaye cor v b pourge therfore olde math xvi whan ſabbat mondaye actu x peter openynge hys luce xxiiii b beholde two tewſdaye actu xiii c ye men brother ye chyl luce xxiiii c ieſus ſtode ye myddeſt wedniſdaye actu iii b ye men iſraell ioh xxi afterwarde dyd ieſus thurſdaye actu viii c angel lord ioh xx b mary ſtode without ye frydaye pet ii c chriſt alſo ſuffred v mat xxviii c eleuen diſciples ſaterdaye pet ii layenge awaye therfore ioh xx fyrſt daye ye ſab ¶on fyrſt ſonday eaſter ioh v borne ioh xx c whan late ¶on ye ſecōde ſonday eaſter pet ii c chriſt alſo ſuffred v ioh x b good ſhepherde ¶on iii ſondaye eaſter pet ii b ye mooſt beloued ioh xvi b yet lytle whyle ¶on iiii ſondaye eaſter iaco b euery beſt gyfte ioh xvi go vnto hym ¶on v ſonday croſſe iaco c ye doer ioh xvi c verely c yf ye ſhall axe mondaye iaco v c knowlege youre ſynnes luce xi ſhall haue tewſdaye tim ii deſyre therfore inſtantly marc xii ieſus ſyttynge ouer ag wedniſdaye actu iiii multitude ioh xiiii thys ſayd ieſus aſcenſion daye actu fyrſt treatyſe verely marc xvi b laſte appea ¶on ſondaye aſcen pet iiii b ye therfore wyſe wa ioh xv c whan comforter whytſoneuen actu xix fortuned whā apol ioh xiiii b yf ye loue kepe cō ¶on whytſondaye actu ii whan dayes ioh xiiii c yf ony man loueth mondaye actu x e commaunded v iohā iii c god dyd ſo loue teuſdaye actu viii b whā apoſtles ye iohā x verely verely c wednyſdaye actu ii b dyd peter lyfte iohā vi e man come vnto thurſdaye actu viii philippe goyng luce ix xii apoſtles beyng cal frydaye actu ii c ye men iſrael heare luce v c befell vpon daye saterdaye actu xiii e nexte sabbat luce iiii e ieſus ryſynge oute ¶on trinite sondaye apoc iiii thys loked behold ioh iii ther man pha corpus chriſti daye cor xi c haue receaued iohā vi f fleſh meate dede ¶on ſondaye trinite ioh iiii c god loue luce xvi c ther certayne ryche ¶on ii sondaye trinite ioh iii b maruayle brother luce xiiii b certayne mā made great ¶on iii sondaye tri petr v become ye therfore luce xv reſortynge ¶on iiii sondaye tri rom viii c ſuppoſe luce vi ye therfore mer • yfull ¶on v sondaye tri pet iii b concluſion ye luce v came paſſe whan ¶on vi sondaye tri rom vi b knowe ye math v b ſaye vnto excepte ¶on vii sondaye tri rom vi c ſpeake maner mar viii thoſe dayes whan ¶on viii sondaye tri rom viii b therfore brother mat vii b beware falſe prophetes ¶on ix sondaye tri cor x ſhuld luſtynge luce xvi ſayde alſo vnto hys ¶on x sondaye cor xii ye knowe whan ye luce xix come ¶on xi sondaye cor xv wyte brother luc xviii b vnto certayne whiche ¶on xii sondaye ii cor iii haue ſuche truſt mar vii goyng forth agayne ¶on xiii sondaye gala iii c vnto abraham hys ſede luce x c bleſſed eyen ¶on xiiii sondaye gala v c ſaye chriſt walke luce xvii c fortuned wente ¶on xv sondaye gala v c yf lyue ſprete let math vi c mā may ſerue two may ¶on xvi ſondaye ephe iii b wherfore deſyre ye luce vii b fortuned afterwarde ¶on xvii ſondaye ephe iiii therfore preſoner luce xiiii happened whā ieſus▪ ¶on xviii sonday cor thanke god alwaye mat xxii phariſes herde ¶on xix sondaye ephe iiii c ye renewed ſprete math ix ieſus goynge vp ¶on xx sondaye ephe v b take hede therfore brother mat xxii ieſus anſweryng ſpake ¶on xxi sondaye ephe vi b finally brother ye ſtrong ioh iiii f ther certayne ¶on xxii ſondaye phil thanke god euery mat xviii c therfore ye kyngdome ¶on xxiii ſondaye phili iiii b ye follower brethrē mat xxii b goynge phariſes ¶on xxiiii ſonday colo therfore alſo ſence mat ix c ſpeakynge theſe wordes ¶on laſt ſonday trinite ſō iere xxiii beholde tyme commeth ioh vi whan ieſus lyfted wedniſday ember weke afore mychaelmaſſe amos▪ ix c beholde tyme commeth marc ix b one people anſwe ¶on frydaye oſe xiiii turne iſrael luce vii one phariſes de ¶on ſatyrday heb ix fyrſt tabernacle luce xiii certayne mā fygge tre ¶in dedication church apoca xxi ihon ſaw holy luce xix beynge gone wal ¶here endeth table epiſtles goſpels ſondayes followeth ye table ye epiſtels goſpels vſed red diuerſe ſayntes dayes yeare ¶on ſaynt andrewes daye rom x b wc harte beleued mat iiii c ieſus walkynge ye ſee ¶on concepcyon lady eccl xxiiii c vyne haue mat boke generaciō ¶on thomas apoſtle daye ephe ii c therfore ye ioh xx c thomas one ye twol ¶on candelmaſſe daye mal iii beholde wyll ſēde meſ luce ii whan dayes theyr ¶on mathias apoſtle daye actu c thoſe dayes peter ry mat e tyme ieſus anſwe ¶on day annunciation gretynge oure lady eſa vii b god ſpeake vnto achas luce b ſyxte moneth ¶on george daye iaco counte full ioye bre ioh xv true vyne ¶on marke ye euangeliſtes daye ephe iiii vnto euery one v ioh xv true vyne fa ¶on philippe iacobs day sap v ſhall ryghteous ioh xiiii ſayde vnto diſcip ¶on natiuite ihon baptiſt eſa xlix herken vnto ye iles luce e elizabeth tyme bry ¶on peter paul daye act xii ſame tyme layed mat xvi b ieſus came coaſtes ¶on iames apoſtles daye ephe ii c therfore ye nowe mat xx c came vnto hym ye mo ¶on aſſumpcion lady eccli xxiiii b al theſe thynges alſo luce x fortuned wente ¶on bartholomeus daye ephe ii c therfore ye luce xxii b ther roſe ſtryfe amōge ¶on natiuite lady eccli xxiiii c vyne haue math boke generacion ¶on mathew apoſtles daye eze b ſimilitude foure math ix b whan ieſus wente ¶on michael daye apoca ſhewed ſendynge mat xviii houre came ¶on luke euangeliſtes day ezech b ſimilitude foure luce x thys appoynted ¶on simon iudas daye rom viii knowe ioh xv b cōmaundement ¶on alhalowe daye apoc vii ſawe another angell math v ieſus ſeynge people ¶on alſoule daye teſ iiii b wyll haue ioh xi
